title: Head of Platforms
description:
*Do you love building scalable platforms and leading awesome tech teams? We’re looking for a Head of Platforms to head up two key groups—Build, Automation & Test and Infrastructure—and help shape the platforms that keep our games and services running smoothly*

### **Role**


As the Platform Services Manager, you will be responsible for setting the strategic and operational direction for two key technology teams: Build, Automation & Test, and Infrastructure. Your primary goal is to deliver a resilient, scalable, and efficient development platform and cloud infrastructure that power Paradox’s games and services.


This is a hands-on leadership position that blends technical guidance with team and process management. You’ll collaborate closely with developers, engineers, and key stakeholders to drive ongoing enhancements, ensuring optimal performance, availability, and security across both development and production environments.

### **Key Responsibilities Include:**

* Provide leadership, guidance, and development opportunities for both the Build, Automation & Test team and the Infrastructure team.
* Take ownership of cloud infrastructure operations and strategic oversight.
* Lead architectural decisions focused on ensuring scalability, high availability, cost efficiency, and robust security across cloud environments/platforms.
* Play an active role in shaping strategy and planning as part of the Central Tech & Services leadership team.
* Partner closely with other departments to maintain adherence to data protection regulations and cloud governance standards.
* Establish and uphold comprehensive security protocols and operational procedures for cloud services.
* Manage and optimize cloud expenditures, while overseeing Platform Services budgeting, vendor negotiations, and contract management.

### **Qualifications:**


Must-Have:

* Demonstrated success in leading high-performing technical teams within DevOps, Site Reliability Engineering (SRE), infrastructure, and/or build automation domains.
* Deep expertise in continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) systems.
* Practical experience with cloud infrastructure, (e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Well-versed in automated testing frameworks and tools.
* Exceptional leadership abilities with strong communication and collaboration skills.


Nice-to-Have:

* Experience in the games industry or with game development.
* Knowledge of infrastructure-as-code (IaC) tools and automation (e.g. Terraform).
* Understanding of observability tools and monitoring frameworks (e.g. Datadog, Prometheus, Grafana).
* Exposure to container orchestration (e.g. Kubernetes, Docker).

 *Want to shape the tech behind legendary games? Take charge of how we build, test, and launch at scale—while leading the platforms that keep everything blazing fast, rock solid, and battle-ready. If you're driven by impact and love moving at full throttle—apply now!*

title: DevSecOps Engineer
description:
Bankgirot söker nu en DevSecOps Egnineer till en växande del av organisationen i Stockholm.  

  

Bankgirot har en unik ställning på Sveriges betalmarknad som nu genomgår den största transformationen i modern tid. Vår IT-organisation är i en tillväxtfas för att utveckla framtidssäkrade lösningar som följer internationell standard och regelverk. Samtidigt ser vi till att det nuvarande betalsystemet fungerar säkert och stabilt – varje dag.  

  

Arbetet med att utveckla framtidens betalinfrastruktur är i full gång och vi behöver dig som vill vara en del av resan. Som DevSecOps Engineer kommer du att spela en viktig roll i uppdraget att säkerställa framtidens betalinfrastruktur på ett teknikbolag där vi har ett stort hjärta för uppdraget – och varandra.

**Din roll**


Vi söker dig som vill vara med i starten av ett nytt DevSecOps-team på Bankgirot. Målet är att göra säker mjukvaruleverans till en naturlig del av vår utvecklingsprocess. Inte bara genom rätt verktyg och tekniska lösningar, utan också genom att stötta våra utvecklingsteam med kunskap och vägledning, och skapa förutsättningar för säker utveckling i praktiken. Fokus ligger på automatisering, säkerhet och effektivitet.  

  

Som DevSecOps Engineer arbetar du nära utvecklingsteamen, bygger CI/CD-flöden med säkerhet från start, utvecklar verktyg som stödjer våra DevSecOps-principer och ser till att vi uppfyller regulatoriska krav.  

  

Du kommer in i ett tidigt skede och får stort utrymme att påverka hur vi jobbar, både tekniskt och organisatoriskt.  

  

**Vi söker dig som har**  

  

Du har arbetat med DevOps-principer i några år och trivs i en roll där teknik, säkerhet och samarbete möts. Du är lösningsorienterad, pragmatisk och nyfiken och vi tror du vill vara med och bygga upp något från grunden.  

  

Vi tror att du har erfarenhet av:  

* CI/CD-verktyg som GitHub Actions, GitLab eller liknande
* Containerteknologier (Docker, Kubernetes)
* Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Pulumi)
* Grundläggande säkerhetsprinciper
* Något eller några programmeringsspråk, t.ex. Java, Typescript eller Bash

  

Har du även erfarenhet av molnplattformar, transaktionstunga system eller reglerad miljö (t.ex. finans) är det ett plus.  

  

**Intresserad?**
I denna rekrytering samarbetar Bankgirot med Ants Tech Recruiters. Vid frågor eller funderingar, kontakta Rebecka Sundqvist på rebecka.sundqvist@ants.se eller +4673 596 51 98.  

  

Urval sker löpande, så tveka inte att ansöka redan idag. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

**Övrig information**


Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning baserad i Liljeholmen i Stockholm. Du behöver ha goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.  

  

Innan anställning beslutas genomförs en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) om tjänsten innebär arbete med säkerhetsklassade uppgifter eller säkerhetskänslig verksamhet.

title: Teknisk skribent
description:
Vi söker nu en teknisk skribent till ett uppdrag inom ett IT-infrastrukturteam. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i att skapa tydlig och användbar dokumentation som stärker teamets arbete och strukturerar komplex teknisk information


**Arbetsuppgifter**

* Skapa och underhålla teknisk dokumentation för interna IT-system.
* Ta fram instruktioner, utbildningsmaterial och dokument för myndighetskrav.
* Arbeta nära systemadministratörer och tekniska experter för att samla in och verifiera information.
* Säkerställa en enhetlig nivå och kvalitet i dokumentationen.
* Migrera dokumentation mellan olika verktyg.
* Arbeta i system som Azure DevOps, Confluence, Visio och MS Office.

**Din profil**


Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av teknisk dokumentation och ett starkt intresse för IT. Du är strukturerad, självgående och van att ta egna initiativ. Du trivs i en miljö där du får kombinera teknisk förståelse med god kommunikationsförmåga – både på svenska och engelska. Du är van att organisera ditt arbete effektivt, är nyfiken och lösningsorienterad.


**Krav**

  

* Erfarenhet av teknisk dokumentation
* God förståelse för IT-system och infrastruktur
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift
* Vana att arbeta med Office-paketet
* Förmåga att samarbeta med tekniska experter

**Meriterande**


* Erfarenhet av verktyg som Azure DevOps, Confluence och Visio
* Kunskap i XML-baserade dokumentationsverktyg


**Är detta uppdrag en chans att navigera vidare i din karriär?** Då ser vi fram emot att höra ifrån dig. Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

 **Uppstart**: September  

**Omfattning**: 100 %  

**Placering**: Göteborg  

**Anställningsform**: Frilans eller projektanställning  

**Uppdragets längd**: 1 år  

**Sista ansökningsdag****:** 4 juli. *Urval och intervjuer sker löpande så vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan. Observera att ansökan kan finnas vara kvar efter sista ansökningsdag fram till dess att alla avtal är signerade.*  

**Kontakt**: hej@fiskenivattnet.se  

  

**Om Fisken i vattnet**


Välkommen till en omtänksam konsultbyrå med ett hav av specialister för nutidens kommunikation och marknadsföring. Människa, AI eller både och. För oss handlar det om att förmedla meningsfulla sammanhang där du och vi trivs som *fisken i vattnet*.

title: Teknisk skribent i Göteborg– bidra till en säkrare framtid
description:
**Om tjänsten**  

Vår kund i Göteborg fortsätter att växa och söker en engagerad och driven teknisk skribent som vill göra skillnad. I denna roll finns möjligheten att arbeta i spännande uppdrag hos branschledande kunder, framför allt inom försvarsindustrin och inom avancerad IT-infrastruktur.



Som teknisk skribent får du en central roll i att skapa struktur och tydlighet inom komplex teknisk information. Arbetet innebär att både ta fram, uppdatera och underhålla teknisk dokumentation för olika system och produkter, vilket kan inkludera allt från monteringsanvisningar och användarmanualer till avancerade instruktioner inom IT och infrastruktur.


**Du erbjuds**  

* Möjlighet att utvecklas tekniskt i en vardag där ingen dag är den andra lik
* Arbeta i ett inkluderande team där kunskapsdelning och kollegialt stöd är en självklarhet
* Vara en del av ett företag med ett starkt samhällsuppdrag, där du får göra konkret skillnad

**Arbetsuppgifter**  

Uppdraget utförs både självständigt och i nära samarbete med tekniska experter och systemadministratörer. Dokumentationen kan rikta sig till både interna användare, myndigheter och externa kunder, vilket ställer höga krav på språklig precision, teknisk förståelse och pedagogisk förmåga.  

* Skapa och uppdatera teknisk produktdokumentation, exempelvis systembeskrivningar, användarinstruktioner, underhållsmanualer och utbildningsmaterial
* Strukturera, enhetliggöra och kvalitetssäkra dokumentationens tekniska nivå
* Migrera dokumentation mellan olika verktyg och plattformar
* Samarbeta med tekniska experter, systemadministratörer och övriga specialister för att samla in, förstå och verifiera information
* Arbeta i verktyg som exempelvis Azure DevOps, Confluence, Visio och Office-paketet

**Din profil**  

Krav:  

* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom teknik, exempelvis maskin, elektronik, IT eller motsvarande område
* Flera års erfarenhet av arbete som teknisk skribent
* Mycket god förmåga att förstå och förklara tekniska lösningar i text
* Flytande svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift
* Goda kunskaper i Office-paketet


Meriterande:  

* Erfarenhet av standarder som S1000D och ASD-STE
* Förståelse för terminologi inom Försvarsmakten och FMV
* Tidigare arbete med XML-verktyg
* Erfarenhet av dokumentation inom IT-infrastrukturmiljöer (t.ex. servrar, nätverk, databaser, virtualisering)
* Erfarenhet från försvarsindustrin eller militär bakgrund, särskilt inom ILS (Integrated Logistics Support)


Den vi söker är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och strukturerad med en naturlig drivkraft att leverera kvalitet. Det är viktigt att kunna organisera sitt arbete effektivt, samtidigt som samarbete och kommunikativ förmåga är avgörande.  

Tjänsten omfattas av försvarssekretess, vilket innebär att godkänd säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll är ett krav. För vissa uppdrag kan krav på visst medborgarskap förekomma.
**Övrigt**  

Start: Enligt överenskommelse  

Omfattning: Heltid  

Placering: Göteborg


**Om oss**  

På Cleverex Bemanning arbetar vi med att rekrytera och hyra ut rätt medarbetare till rätt kund. Vårt största fokus ligger på våra kunder, konsulter och kandidater och vårt mål är att du som kandidat ska känna att du hamnat helt rätt!


  
Kategori
**Skribenter/publishing**
Tjänsten
**Informatör**
Placeringsort
**Stockholm**
Yrkesområde
**Visstidsanställning**
Omfattning
**Heltid**
Sista ansökningsdag
**02/08/2025**

title: Data & AI Consultant
description:
Are you passionate about creating impactful data solutions that combine deep technical expertise with real business value? Are you curious about how AI can push those insights even further? Do you excel in **Power BI**, **data warehousing**, and **data engineering**, and want to stay ahead with the latest in **AI and analytics**?


At Evitec Solutions, we’re growing our Stockholm team and looking for someone like you. In our team, you’ll work with top-tier clients mostly in the finance sector, helping them unlock the value of their data. Example solutions could be building robust data warehouses, designing modern BI solutions, and experimenting with AI tools.


**What you’ll be doing:**

* Designing and delivering Power BI solutions including report creation and semantic model building that drive real business decisions
* Implementing governance and administration best practices in Power BI Service
* Applying and advising on CI/CD and version control for BI (e.g., using Azure DevOps, deployment pipelines in Power BI/Fabric)
* Building modern data warehouses and data pipelines using tools like Microsoft Fabric, Snowflake, or Databricks
* Working directly with clients, advising them on architecture, governance, and AI-driven enhancements
* Working hands-on with SQL, data modeling, and cloud platforms (like Azure)
* Exploring and applying AI tools to enhance data workflows and insights

**What makes you a great fit?**

* Proven expertise in Power BI, including semantic modelling, advanced DAX, optimization, and report development
* Solid understanding of data warehousing and engineering concepts and hands-on experience with Microsoft Fabric, Snowflake, or Databricks
* Experience implementing governance and administration in Power BI Service environments
* Familiarity with CI/CD practices and deployment pipelines (e.g., Azure DevOps)
* Experience with RLS and OLS implementations
* Strong SQL skills and good understanding of data modelling principles
* At least 2 years of experience in consulting and a proactive mindset and ability to take ownership of projects and advise clients effectively
* Curiosity and enthusiasm for AI and automation in data solutions
* Fluent in Swedish in both spoken and written
* Professional level in English in both spoken and written

**Why join us?**

* **Purpose with impact:** Join our growing Stockholm team at Evitec and help deliver trusted insurance and risk management solutions with a strong market presence.
* **Flexibility**: We work in hybrid mode.
* **Growth**: Whether it’s certifications, mentoring, or internal training, we’re here to help you achieve your career goals.
* **Compensation**: We offer competitive salary and benefits.


At Evitec Solutions, we create innovative IT solutions and advisory services that support our customers' success across industries. With over 300 professionals across the Nordics, we specialize in providing business-critical software for the finance and insurance sectors. Our solutions streamline complex processes, enabling smarter decisions and delivering long-term value.


If you'd like to have more information about Evitec or the job before applying, you can contact People & Culture Manager Therese Blank through email: (firstname.lastname@evitec.com).

**Interested?**  

Make sure you put in your application latest 10.08.2025, we review applications on a rolling basis.

title: Platform Engineer Leader in OTM (Oracle Transport Manager) – Supply Chain Development
description:
* **Job ID:** R0012300
* **Date posted:** 04/07/2025
**Company description*** Inter IKEA Group brings together three core businesses: Franchise, Range and Supply. Together we work constantly to improve the IKEA home furnishing offer and make it more accessible for the many people. You will be part of IKEA Supply and the Supply Chain Development organisation. IKEA Supply is responsible for securing that the product offer is produced and delivered to our customers. We lead the supply agenda across many functions and work together with all business areas, different business units, but also retail markets to secure customer availability in all markets and sales channels at lowest total cost.
* Together, we create a workplace where everyone feels free to be themselves – to experiment, try new ways, and dare to ask, “What if…?” We believe in everyday personal growth and offer the opportunity to develop your career globally. At IKEA we have a vibrant culture where ideas are heard, where there is opportunity to learn new skills and where the goal always is "to create a better everyday life for the many people". We give down-to-earth, straightforward people the possibility to grow, both as individuals and in their professional roles. We offer this position in a fast paced, truly global environment with an endless supply of challenges and development opportunities.
* IKEA is on a constant journey to create a better everyday life for the many people by continuously re-invent ourselves as we continue to grow and develop to meet and exceed our customers’ needs. We will transform our digital capabilities, bringing core business processes, people, data & technology together - an enabler for IKEA to become an even better home furnishing company in the future. A journey that needs passionate people who embrace change, dare to question, and want to make a difference. If that sounds like you, come and join us.
* To realize our ambitions in the IKEA Supply Strategy, IKEA has recognized the need to improve and modernize our work methods. We are upgrading our current Transport Management Platform while harmonizing and standardizing our Transport Business processes for all of IKEA. **This new position offers an excellent opportunity to strategically oversee development scheduling and resource planning, ensuring alignment with business priorities and the needs of Digital Products.** As a person you are valued for your collaborative spirit and your strong leadership, which focuses equally on processes, platforms, and people.
* The IKEA culture and values are crucial for our business and day to day work life. For you to thrive and grow with IKEA it’s important for us that you share our values! You can read more regarding our values and life at IKEA on our website www.ikea.com or just watch this video: https://bit.ly/ikea-what-if
 **Job description*** We are seeking a Platform Engineer Leader to manage the complexities and demands of continuous development requests and priorities within an Oracle-based environment: the IKEA Oracle Transport Management Platform.
* In this role, you will lead and manage the development team to effectively deliver high-quality results, thereby generating value for the business.
* We expect you to enhance coordination and efficiency across the Digital Product and Platform teams, striving for continuous improvement in our current Ways of Working while ensuring quality and mitigating risks.
* More specifically, in this role you will be covering following topics:
* + **Team Leadership**:
		- Leading a team of developers, engineers, or other technical staff.
		- Providing guidance, mentorship, and support to team members.
		- Conducting performance reviews and facilitating career development for team members.
		- Managing project resources, budgets, and risks.
	+ **Technical Oversight**:
		- Ensuring the technical quality and integrity of the projects.
		- Reviewing and approving technical designs, architecture, and code.
		- Staying updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to incorporate best practices.
	+ **Stakeholder Communication**:
		- Acting as a liaison between the development team and other stakeholders (e.g. Architects, Digital Products, other platform teams).
		- Communicating backlog progress, challenges, and solutions effectively.
	+ **Process Improvement**:
		- Identifying inefficiencies in current processes and making recommendations for improvements in collaboration with the Agile Delivery Lead.
		- Enable the move to DevOps teams to optimize lifecycle delivery
		- Implementing new development methodologies and tools to enhance productivity and quality.
	+ **Planning**:
		- Contributing to the planning of the platform’s technical activities.
		- Aligning team goals with Digital Product and Platform objectives and strategies.
	+ **Problem Resolution**:
		- Addressing and resolving technical issues and conflicts that arise within the team.
		- Ensuring that team is aligned and connected cross functionally
	+ **Quality Assurance**:
		- Overseeing testing and quality assurance processes to ensure the final products meet the required standards.
		- Implementing and monitoring best practices for code and product quality.
  

**Qualification*** To be successful in this job you have:
* **Technical skills:**
* + Deep knowledge of programming languages (e.g., Java, SQL, C and C+, etc.).
	+ Understanding of software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum, Waterfall).
	+ Experience with development tools and technologies
	+ Proficiency in project management software (e.g., JIRA).
	+ Ability to create and manage project plans, timelines, and budgets.
	+ Familiarity with risk management and mitigation.
	+ Ability to design and review system architecture.
	+ Expertise in conducting thorough code reviews.
	+ Familiarity with software testing methods and tools (e.g., unit testing)
	+ Understanding of databases, SQL, and data modeling.
	+ Knowledge of cybersecurity principles and practices.
	+ Ensuring compliance with data protection regulations.
	+ Ability to produce and maintain comprehensive technical documentation.
* **Soft Skills:**
* + Strong leadership qualities to inspire and guide a team.
	+ Ability to mentor and support team members in their professional growth.
	+ Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	+ Ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
	+ Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.
	+ Ability to think critically and make well-informed decisions under pressure.
	+ Ability to work effectively within a team and foster a collaborative environment.
	+ Talent for building strong relationships with cross-functional teams.
	+ Flexibility to adapt to changing project requirements and priorities.
	+ Openness to learning new technologies and approaches.
	+ Strong organizational skills and ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
	+ Skill in resolving interpersonal conflicts and technical disagreements.
	+ Ability to mediate and find solutions that satisfy all parties involved.
	+ Ability to align technical initiatives with business objectives.
	+ Focus on long-term goals and the big picture.
* **In this role you will report to our Platform Manager within Supply Data & technology.**
  

**More Information*** **Please note, we have a preferred candidate for this position.**  

  

**We look forward to receiving your application in English.** Please note that we will be interviewing continuously, which means that we may close the application process earlier than stated if we find the right candidate. **This position is based in Malmö, Sweden.**
* **We regret that we are unable to handle applications made by e-mail.** We encourage you to apply as soon as possible, but no later than **18 Jul. 2025.** For questions regarding the recruitment process, please contact **People & Culture Specialist Katie Pettersson at** katie.pettersson2@inter.ikea.com.
* We look forward to receiving your application.
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Vi söker en
 **DevOps Engineer** 
 med några års arbetslivserfarenhet och som har passion för att bygga stabila och effektiva miljöer. Här får du arbeta hos vår kund inom försvarsindustrin och i nära samarbete med utvecklingsteam. Du kommer att få chansen att arbeta med teknologier och system som Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, Linux och mycket mer.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som DevOps engineer kommer du att spela en viktig roll i att bygga samt underhålla kundens mjukvarufabriksplattform med verktyg som Kubernetes, Vault, Grafana m.m. Du kommer att arbeta nära utvecklingsteamen på plats för att säkerställa att applikationer och pipelines uppfyller krav för distribution och testning. Det kommer även innebära att utveckla och underhålla script samt övervakning och felsökning av problem kopplat till bl.a. drift och nätverk. Du kommer dagligen samarbeta med andra personer i teamet för att förbättra pipelines, säkerhet och skalbarhet.
   

  

**Vi tror att du är en driven DevOps engineer som har:**
* Några års erfarenhet inom DevOps-tools.
* Erfarenhet av kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, Grafana, Confluence, Docker.
* Kunskap inom automatisering och scripting, gärna erfarenhet av verktyg som Bash, Python eller Go.
* Kunskap om Linux/Unix baserade system och infrastruktur.
* Stark kommunikationsförmåga på svenska i både tal och skrift.


**Vad vi erbjuder**
 Hos oss får du en stabil anställning med:
   

  

* Konkurrenskraftiga villkor och fast månadslön
* Möjligheter att utvecklas och specialisera dig inom ditt expertområde
* En öppen och trivsam arbetskultur med regelbundna aktiviteter för teamkänsla och gemenskap


**Om oss**
 Vi är en ledande aktör inom drift och IT-infrastruktur och arbetar med marknadsledande företag inom en rad olika branscher. Här får du möjlighet att utvecklas inom avancerade projekt och arbeta med den senaste tekniken. Vi är måna om att våra medarbetare trivs och erbjuder en trygg och utvecklande miljö där du får stöd i din karriärutveckling.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Låter detta som ditt nästa steg? Urval sker löpande, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 Senior DevOps Engineer
   

  

**This** 
**is** 
**Worldline**
 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
   

  

**The O** 
**pportunity**
 We are seeking a versatile Software Engineer to join our Platform Engineering DevOps team, and work in a constantly evolving, dynamic, and agile environment, believing that the route to speed and stability is through automation. Teamwork, communication, and speaking your mind are of high importance to us, especially when they come with a curious mind, a willingness to grow, and exchange ideas and knowledge.
   

  

 In this role, along with a team of 8 members, you’ll set up AWS (Amazon Web Services) infrastructure which is handling millions of transactions worth billions of Euros. The team has a DevSecOps standpoint, owns, develops, and manages all Infrastructure as Code in AWS accounts, running 100s of containers and serverless functions; If you build it, you run it!
   

  

 If this looks exciting and you are eager to continue growing your professional capabilities with ongoing training and educational opportunities, come join us!
   

  

**Day-to-Day Responsibilities**
 Delivering the committed objectives that include adapting to any new needs to reach the goal
   

  

* On-call duty according to a rotating schedule
* Participate in your team's day-to-day activities including tools development, operations, maintenance, and support
* Being an active member in our agile events like daily stand-ups, planning, retros, and demos. etc.
* Foster team spirit, quality and technical agility


**Who Are We Looking For**
 We look for big thinkers. People who can drive positive change, step up and show what’s next – people with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. In practice this means:
   

  

 You have proven experience in systems engineering, automating infrastructure creation & maintenance tasks using Docker, Jenkins, Terraform\ CloudFormation, etc.
   

  

* You have a bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, distributed systems, software engineering, or another equivalent field
* You have relevant experience in supporting/operating transaction driven and highly available platforms running microservices with 99.99% uptime
* You have a curiosity about security solutions such as WAF, IDS/IPS, Anti-DDOS, and SIEM
* You have work experience in programming (Python scripting) and an interest in automation
* You are passionate about cloud services, pay attention to details, handle many different partners and you are accountable to deliver results in a fast-paced environment


**Perks & Benefits**
 At Worldline you’ll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
   

  

* Being a part of a company guided by a strong purpose to do good and recognized as top 1% of the most sustainable companies in all sectors worldwide
* Health benefits contribution
* Health check – Every 2nd year
* Pension: BTP1 & BTP2
* Private Health Care Insurance (Euro Accident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.


**Shape the evolution**
 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on the society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
   

  

**Learn More About Life At Worldline At Jobs.worldline.com**
 We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.

title: Test Engineer
description:
**Job Description:**








**Mobile Testing Profile:**








* Pre-Launch mobile device testing, Handset Testing ,Mobile chipset Testing, and Prototype models.
* Filed testing, Sanity testing, Feature testing, Functional testing, System testing, Device Flashing, Compatibility testing, Retesting, Regression Testing, Performance testing, Load testing, Stress testing, Mobility and Stationary testing of
 **2G/3G/ 4G LTE/5G VoLTE** 
 smartphones in mobile handsets in India and Abroad.
* Device acquisition, flashing on latest SW built, performing stationary, mobility testing,
 

 Network Testing.

 Performance, and location functionality of cell phones.

* Preparation of bug & test summary report, Execution of test cases on GSM, WCDMA/UMTS, LTE, IRAT and VoLTE
 **,** 
 Involvement in Test plan Preparation and preparation of test strategy .

title: Infrastruktur- & DevOps-konsult
description:
**Vill du jobba med moderna teknologier, infrastruktur som kod och CI/CD – samtidigt som du bidrar till ett säkrare och mer robust samhälle? Combitech i Stockholm söker nu en DevOps/Infrastruktur-konsult.**
**Vi erbjuder dig en roll som konsult där du får möjlighet att jobba nära våra kunder inom försvar, myndighet eller industri – alla med fokus på säkerhet, långsiktighet och teknisk höjd. Du kommer arbeta med automation, molnplattformar, containers och moderna pipelines i några av Sveriges mest intressanta teknikmiljöer.**
 Rollen
   

  

**I Rollen Kommer Du Att**
* Automatisera och optimera bygg- och driftsflöden med moderna DevOps-verktyg.
* Bygga och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines i t.ex. Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions eller Jenkins.
* Arbeta med containerlösningar (Docker, Kubernetes) och infrastrukturen kring dessa.
* Hantera infrastruktur som kod (IaC) med verktyg som Terraform eller Ansible.
* Implementera monitorering och loggning med Prometheus, Grafana, ELK m.fl.
* Skripta i Bash, PowerShell eller Python för att effektivisera återkommande moment.
* Bidra till säker och stabil drift i både test- och produktionsmiljöer.


 Vi söker dig som
   

  

* Har examen inom teknik/IT eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Har flera års erfarenhet av DevOps-arbete, CI/CD och molntjänster (AWS, Azure eller GCP).
* Är trygg med infrastruktur- och utvecklingsnära verktyg.
* Har god förståelse för nätverk (TCP/IP, DNS m.m.).
* Är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och gillar att jobba i team.
* Bonus: erfarenhet från samhällsviktiga miljöer, säkerhet eller regulatorisk utveckling


**Då tjänsten innebär arbete som omfattas av försvarssekretess krävs det att du genomför och godkänns i en säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll.**
**Urval sker efter annonsens utgång och vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!**
 Kom och gör skillnad!
   

  

 Vi arbetar främst med kunder inom försvarssektorn och industrin. Vi vill ständigt öka vår förmåga att möta och överträffa de krav som ställs i ett osäkert omvärldsläge. Vi är specialister på våra kunders unika behov och vi accelererar kundens utveckling genom att skapa team med rätt kompetens, tydligt driv och en passion för uppdraget. Hos oss får du vara med och utveckla ditt ledarskap för att möta kraven i framtidens samhälle.
   

  

 Vårt kompetensutvecklingsprogram Combitech GROW ingår som en naturlig del i din anställning. Vi ger dig möjlighet att växa i en företagskultur som uppmuntrar till såväl personlig som professionell utveckling, samtidigt som du arbetar i spännande och givande uppdrag.
   

  

 Vill du veta mer om hur det är att arbeta hos oss? Kolla in våra karriärsidor på vår webb!
   

  

 Kontakt/rekryterande chef: Petra Charlotte Arrenäs, petracharlotte.arrenas@combitech.com
   

  

 Vi undanber oss rekryteringssamarbeten.

title: Software Engineer (DevOps) - AI Voice Agent Platform
description:
**Join Telavox as Software Engineer- AI Voice 🎙️**
 Are you a DevOps engineer passionate about scalable systems and seamless deployments?
   

  

 We are expanding our AI Voice Agent Platform and looking for a Software Engineer who thrives where development, automation, and AI meet.
   

  

 In this role, placed in Malmö or Stockholm, you'll help us build a reliable foundation for iterating on AI voice products. You’ll collaborate closely with engineers across disciplines to streamline our deployment strategies, automation, and ensure peak performance in production.
   

  

 If you'd like to take your next step within Telavox and are excited by the challenge of enabling AI at scale, this is your opportunity!
   

  

**About The Job**
 You’ll be working on evolving our AI Voice Agent Platform. Your mission is to ensure that our development and deployment pipelines are scalable, reliable, and tuned for the unique needs of voice AI. You’ll work side-by-side with AI engineers and software developers, driving improvements across CI/CD, testing, and observability. Your work will directly impact how quickly and confidently we ship voice AI innovations to customers.
   

  

**Your Day-to-day Work May Include**
* Designing and implementing scalable CI/CD pipelines using tools like GitHub Actions or Jenkins, tailored for AI voice agent development.
* Developing automated testing frameworks unit, integration, and end-to-end to validate AI agent performance and natural language understanding (NLU).
* Collaborating on smart deployment strategies, including canary releases and A/B testing, to roll out AI updates with precision and insight.
* Monitoring and analyzing production performance, proactively identifying optimization opportunities, and ensuring reliability.


**About You**
 You're a technically driven engineer who enjoys building strong foundations for rapid, safe, and scalable development. You’re energized by working closely with other AI specialists and backend developers, and you have a passion for automation, quality, and observability. You thrive on solving complex systems challenges and care deeply about performance, stability, and continuous improvement.
   

  

**Key Skills And Experience We’re Looking For**
* Hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., GitHub Actions, Jenkins)
* Strong foundation in observability and production monitoring tools
* Passion for automation and improving development workflows


**Good-to-have Skills**
* Experience with progressive deployment strategies (e.g., canary releases, A/B testing, rollbacks)
* Python proficiency
* Familiarity with AI


****Join us at Telavox 💚****
 Since Telavox's journey started in 2002, we have strengthened our position as the leading forward-thinking communication platform for businesses. As a digital mobile operator, we develop and own our all-in-one communication platform, which integrates telephony, PBX, messaging, meetings, and contact centers, giving businesses a smarter way to connect.
   

  

 Today, we’re a thriving company with 1.9 billion SEK in revenue and 500+ Telavoxers across nine countries. We embrace AI and automation to push the boundaries of business communication.
   

  

 We offer flexible work options and adaptable hours, giving you the freedom to balance life and career while staying connected to our vibrant Telavox culture.
   

  

**How to apply!**
**How to apply!**
 At Telavox, we don't focus on fitting in; we focus on making room for everyone.
   

  

 We’re always on the lookout for great talent, so applications are reviewed continuously. If you're ready to be part of an innovative, AI-driven telecom company, apply today with your CV and cover letter in English.
   

  

**A quick heads-up: It’s vacation time over here, so things are moving a little slower than usual. We’re still reviewing applications and will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you so much for your patience! 🏖️💚**
**Learn more about what we do! ⬇️**
 Telavox develops world-leading communications platforms with solutions for smart and efficient telephony, PBX, chat and much more. Regardless of whether it involves an entrepreneur-driven startup or a giant among giants, Telavox contributes to making companies more transparent, efficient and accessible.

title: QA Engineer
description:
**Why join us?**
 We’re on a mission to empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. As the world-leader in assistive communication solutions, we empower our customers to express themselves, connect with the world, and live richer lives.
   

  

 At Tobii Dynavox, you can grow your career within a dynamic, global company that has a clear, impactful purpose - with the flexibility to also do what truly matters to you outside of work. What’s more, you’ll be part of a work culture where collaboration is the norm and individuality is welcomed.
   

  

 As a member of our team, you’ll have the power to innovate for good. You’ll see your ideas in use in new applications, work with the latest technology on leading platforms, and deliver meaningful solutions for our customers.
   

  

 We are seeking a skilled, proactive and adaptable
 **QA Engineer** 
 to join our Enterprise IT Engineering team as our first dedicated quality assurance professional, supporting quality assurance across our
 **custom-developed internal systems** 
 as well as
 **Salesforce CRM,** 
 and
 **Microsoft Dynamics 365 ERP** 
 platforms. You will play a key role in establishing testing standards and practices while ensuring the quality, reliability, performance, and compliance of business-critical applications and integrations.
   

  

 You will work closely with developers, analysts, and business stakeholders to design test strategies, validate complex workflows, and support high-impact releases.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Test end-to-end workflows that span across Salesforce, D365, and internal platforms.
* Design and execute functional, integration, non-functional and regression test cases to ensure quality, performance, and data integrity.
* Identify opportunities for test automation and implement scalable, reliable coverage by integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines for early and continuous quality feedback.
* Advocate security-aware development through validation of access controls, data handling, and compliance with regulations like GDPR and HIPAA.
* Participate in sprint ceremonies to align test coverage with business and technical requirements, fostering a quality-first mindset through early involvement, close collaboration with developers, shift-left testing practices, mentorship, and quality standards.
* Support User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and lead post-deployment validation activities to ensure production stability and stakeholder confidence.
* Investigate, document, and track defects, conduct root cause analysis, and work closely with development and business teams to ensure timely resolution.
* Monitor and assess the impact of Salesforce and D365 platform updates on existing customizations, workflows, and integrations, ensuring proactive test planning.
* Continuously improve QA practices by analyzing testing outcomes, capturing metrics, and identifying process optimizations for better quality, speed, and collaboration.


**Required Qualifications**
* At least 5 years of QA experience, with a strong understanding of QA methodologies, Agile processes, and SDLC.
* Proven experience with both manual testing and test automation across modern technology stacks.
* Experience establishing QA practices in growing organizations
* A strong grasp of testing strategy, prioritization, risk-based assessments, and quality metrics.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions).
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to clearly articulate test outcomes, risks, and recommendations.
* A collaborative and hands-on mindset with the ability to influence teams toward quality-driven practices.
* A degree in engineering, computer science, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).


**Nice-To-Have**
* Experience or familiarity with testing in .NET / C# and Azure environments. While not a requirement, this would be valuable as many of our applications are built in .NET and run on Azure.
* Experience with Salesforce and D365 testing tools (Provar, Selenium, RSAT or similar)
* A keen eye for detail and the ability to reproduce complex issues reliably.


**Growth Opportunities**
 This role offers a unique opportunity to build quality assurance practices from the ground up, with potential for team leadership as we expand our QA capabilities. You will work across diverse technologies and gain deep expertise in enterprise system integration testing
   

  

 Apply today!
   

  

 We believe in empowering individuals - including our own employees - to reach their full potential. So, if you want to change lives while growing your own career, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Data Engineer
description:
**Microsoft Specialised - Senior Data Engineer** 




  





 Looking for a role where you can shape meaningful projects, grow your skills, and actually enjoy the people you work with?
 



  





 We’re working with a specialist Microsoft data consultancy in Sweden that blends the best of both worlds:
 



  





***“The opportunities of the big company. The thoughtfulness of the small company.”***




  





 They’re part of a larger tech group, which gives them access to a broad client base and long-term projects across industries like finance, defence, public sector, and retail. But day-to-day, you’ll be part of a close-knit 45-person consultancy that values autonomy, collaboration, and community.
 



  





 This team is known for its award-winning culture - consistently ranked among Europe’s best workplaces, based on employee feedback. They invest heavily in knowledge-sharing, competence development, and creating an environment where engineers genuinely enjoy their work.
 



  





 🔍 The Role
 


* Work on client projects where you’ll build and run data platforms from the ground up
* Collaborate with experienced engineers in a high-trust, low-hierarchy environment
* Focus on backend data engineering (not front-end BI/reporting)
* Tech stack includes Python, PySpark, Databricks, CI/CD, orchestration, and Terraform
* Microsoft Fabric experience is a bonus, but not essential



  





 ✅ What They’re Looking For
 


* 3+ years of experience in data engineering (especially from long-term projects at major banks, insurers, or public sector clients)
* Strong backend engineering skills and a solid understanding of modern data platforms
* A collaborative mindset and eagerness to contribute to a knowledge-sharing culture
* Curiosity, autonomy, and a desire to grow in a supportive, people-first environment



  





 🌟 Why Join?
 


* 7 weeks vacation!!!
* Full flexibility in how much you work and what you learn - no cap on development
* Regular conferences abroad, social events, and a strong internal community
* A simple, human interview process - just a conversation to see if there’s a mutual fit
* A team that genuinely enjoys working together and takes pride in doing great work



  





 If you’re looking for a role that combines meaningful projects with a genuinely great place to do them, this could be the one.

title: Laboratory Engineer
description:
Join a trailblazing biotech on the cutting edge of science and technology.
 







 Hobson Prior is seeking a Laboratory Engineer to join a project-focused team in Södertälje. This role is administrative in nature and involves working with computerized systems to support quality control (QC) operations. You will collaborate with a small team to implement laboratory methods into a digital system by the end of 2025. This position does not involve hands-on lab work but requires a background in laboratory environments.
 












 Please note that to be considered for this role you must have the right to work in this location.
 







**Responsibilities:** 



* Connect laboratory instruments to a digital system.
* Test and integrate new methods into the system.
* Train users on system functionalities and provide ongoing support.
* Manage and update chemical and preparation data within the system.
* Troubleshoot system issues and assist users as needed.
* Build and maintain analytical methods and data processes in the system.
* Translate lab analyses into step-by-step digital workflows.
* Create and review test scripts for data validation.
* Collaborate with global teams and external contractors to ensure project progress.
* Support harmonization of processes across global sites.












**Key Skills and Requirements:** 



* Strong proficiency in English.
* Experience in quality control operations and computerized systems.
* Familiarity with Laboratory Execution Systems (LES) is highly desirable.
* Ability to work in structured project environments with clear delivery goals.
* Attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and creativity in finding solutions.
* Background in laboratory work is preferred, though this role is administrative.













**Additional Information:** 



* Start Date: 11 August 2025
* End Date: 19 December 2025
* Full-time, on-site role in Gärtuna
* Selected candidates will undergo background checks and alcohol/drug testing.







 For more information, please contact
 **Mandi Cakwe** 
 .
 

















 If you are interested in applying to this exciting opportunity, then please click 'Apply' or to speak to one of our specialists visit the 'Contact Us' page.
 



 Hobson Prior is a leading life sciences recruiter focused on finding exceptional people and matching them with the finest positions across the globe. Hobson Prior is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.
 



 By submitting this application, you confirm that you've read and understood our privacy policy, which informs you how we process and safeguard your data - https://www.hobsonprior.com/privacy-policy.

title: Azure-specialist inom säkerhet och infrastruktur
description:
Till vår kund i Solna söker vi efter en Azure-specialist som trivs i en dynamisk och tekniskt avancerad miljö och vill arbeta med moderna molnteknologier. Vår kund utvecklar hållbara lösningar för morgondagens samhälle och industri och verkar inom flera affärsområden, inklusive fastighetsutveckling och förvaltning, entreprenad och service inom industri, bygg och infrastruktur. Med sina innovativa och hållbara lösningar strävar de efter att skapa välmående samhällen och framtida industrilösningar.
   

  

 Tjänsten börjar som ett konsultuppdrag med möjlighet att gå över till kunden efter 6 månader.
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 I rollen som Azure-specialist inom säkerhet och infrastruktur kommer du att ha ett stort ansvar för att konfigurera och underhålla Azure-miljön, säkerställa att den är stabil, optimerad och anpassad för verksamhetens behov. Du arbetar med att implementera och optimera Azure-infrastruktur, inklusive hantering av resurser och applikationer. Vidare kommer du att ha ett viktat fokus på säkerhetsaspekter, där du ansvarar för att implementera säkerhetsåtgärder, hantera Microsoft Defender samt analysera loggar för att identifiera och förebygga potentiella hot.
   

  

 En stor del av arbetet handlar också om att effektivisera och automatisera processer. Med hjälp av PowerShell och andra verktyg bygger du lösningar som förbättrar säkerhet och prestanda. Du kommer att hantera och konfigurera Intune för enhetshantering och arbeta med nätverkslösningar i Azure, samtidigt som du felsöker eventuella problem som kan uppstå.
   

  

**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har en gedigen bakgrund inom Microsofts ekosystem, med djupgående kunskap inom Azure, Microsoft Defender och PowerShell. Du har en förståelse för moderna DevOps-principer och hur nätverksinfrastrukturer i molnet är uppbyggda.
   

  

 Som person är du nyfiken och engagerad, med en stark vilja att hålla dig uppdaterad inom nya teknologier och säkerhetslösningar. Du har en god kommunikationsförmåga och trivs med att samarbeta i team, samtidigt som du kan arbeta självständigt och driva projekt framåt.
   

  

**Krav**
* Erfarenhet av Microsoft Azure – Konfiguration och säkerhetshantering i molnmiljöer.
* Kunskap om Microsoft Defender – Implementering och hantering av säkerhetslösningar.
* Erfarenhet av PowerShell – Skriptning och automatisering av processer i Microsoft-miljöer.
* Förståelse för DevOps-principer – Erfarenhet av hur DevOps-tekniker används i praktiken.
* Felsökning av infrastruktur och nätverk – Primärt molnbaserat men även enklare on-prem-lösningar.
* Erfarenhet av Intune – Hantering av klienter och policykonfigurationer.
* Automatiseringserfarenhet – Byggt och implementerat automatiseringar för säkerhetsprocesser.


**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

*Mer om oss*
 Centric är ett IT-företag med 370 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.
