title: Pre-sales Solutioner (Mechanical engineering)
description:
**At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.**

**Your role**  

**We are now looking for a senior mechanical engineer with a strong profile within Automotive Exterior & Interior areas to act as a technical leader and pre-sales solutioner. The role will include regular consulting assignments in technical projects, but the expectation is also to develop our offers within the Automotive Center of Excellence. This is including but not limited to acting as the front face towards clients, expanding our footprint and driving RFQ work.**

***In this role you will play a key role in:***  

* **Lead and coordinate product development projects or subsystems from concept to series production**
* **Act as a Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for internal and external stakeholders.**
* **Ensure project deliverables meet set requirements and deadlines.**
* **Coordinate cross-functional teams and collaborate with other R&D departments.**
* **Oversee technical documentation and verify requirement fulfillment.**
* **Guide and build efficient teams, prioritizing tasks and fostering collaboration.**
**Needs Assessment: Engage with Customer representatives to gain a deep understanding of their engineering project requirements, pain points, and desired outcomes.**

**Solution Design: Leverage your technical expertise and industry knowledge to architect comprehensive solutions that address Customer's specific needs. This includes selecting appropriate technologies, defining system architectures, and developing project plans.**

**Proposal Development: Create persuasive proposals that clearly articulate the proposed solution, its benefits, and associated costs.**

**Presentation and Communication: Confidently present proposed solutions to Customer stakeholders, effectively communicating technical concepts and business value.**

**Relationship Management: Cultivate strong relationships with Customer contacts, fostering trust and positioning our company as a preferred engineering services provider.**

**Your profile**  

* **Min. bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering, automotive engineering, or similar.**
* **10+ years of experience in automotive product development, with a strong focus on exterior and interior components and systems.**
* **Experience with the entire product development process, from concept to launch and running production.**
* **Fluent in Swedish and English**
* **Experience in project management and team leadership.**
* **Knowledge of CAD systems (e.g., CATIA V5 and/or Creo) and PLM systems (e.g., Teamcenter and/or PDMlink) is meritorious.**
* **Meritorious to have experience of estimating work efforts and doing quotation work.**
**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**  

* **We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.**
* **At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.**
* **We support your personal development and offer an education library with more than 250 000 (!) courses and educations and certifications.**
**#LI-AN5**

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.**

title: Business Systems Specialist
description:
**Fantastic challenges. Amazing opportunities.**

  


GKN Aerospace is reimagining air travel: going further, faster and greener! Fuelled by great people whose expertise and creativity sets the standards in our industry, we’re inspired by the opportunities to innovate and break boundaries. We’re proud to play a part in protecting the world’s democracies. And we’re committed to putting sustainability at the centre of everything we do, opening up and protecting our planet. With over 16,000 employees across 33 manufacturing sites in 12 countries we serve over 90% of the world’s aircraft and engine manufacturers and achieved sales of £3.35 bn.in 2023. There are no limits to where you can take your career.


**We are hiring a SAP Specialist for the ERP CoE Team**
-------------------------------------------------------



Would you like to be part of a dynamic challenging environment at the most Trusted and Sustainable Partner in the sky? If you have a passion for ERP, and mainly SAP, enjoy delivering innovative and core enterprise solutions, join us on the journey of powering the future of sustainable flight!



The ERP CoE is a global function of 20 employees within the IT organization and part of Business Line Engines. We operate from sites, like Newington and El Cajon in USA, Johor in Malaysia, Kongsberg in Norway and Trollhättan in Sweden. The ERP strategy for Engines is SAP.



Every time you travel by air almost anywhere in the world, it is likely that GKN is helping you on your way. We are looking for people who want to make a difference, talented members with the skills and passions to become the best of the future in what they do.



We are looking for an experienced SAP specialist that will embark on our digital transformation journey across our ERP Landscape. We are supporting and developing both ECC and S/4 HANA systems.  

You will be part of a diverse IT team that challenges itself to provide innovative solutions in high profile, complex projects and working alongside excellent colleagues from across the globe.

**Job Responsibilities**
------------------------


* You will act as a skilled and knowledge team member, collaborate with subject matter experts, provide the business global SAP support and deliver best practices around the design and implementation of SAP applications and solutions in line with the business requirements.
* You will work across different modules within SAP but mainly within Logistics.
* Design and configure end-to-end solutions and ensure deliverables are consistent with design principles, standards and methodologies
* Support acceptance testing for customizations and application releases.
* Support users located at various sites across Europe, US and Asia
* Expected travel only occasionally
**Job Qualifications**
----------------------


* Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent work experience


**Experienced in SAP**


* Required work experience like 3-5 years of work in a SAP environment.
* Senior level of experience in SAP application required.
**Personal Skills**
-------------------


**Solution Provider**  

Able to identify and solve problems in straightforward situations by analyzing possible solutions using experience and judgment.

  


**Energized by Teamwork**  

Demonstrate teamwork and collaboration skills and ability to manage priorities effectively.

  


**Effective Communicator**  

Effective verbal and written communication skills in Swedish and English for providing basic information about event timelines, technical designs, system concepts and business impact.

  


**Passionate about how to transform SAP**  

Eager to drive interdependent SAP solutions with SAP Best Practice to stay resilient, agile, productive, and sustainable by exploring functionalities for logistics and production execution and more.

  


**Curious about Cloud Environments**  

Curious about how SAP RISE and other Cloud technologies can help bring "intelligence" into SAP applications, including automations and other new technologies.

  


**Comfortable with development methodologies**  

Have experience with agile ways of working.

  



Great consideration will be given to your personal suitability for the position!

**Application and Employment**
------------------------------


**Employment:** Permanent

  


**City for position:** Trollhättan

  


**Last Application date:** 2025-08-31



For more information, please contact hiring manager:  

Åsa Kuhalampi, +46 700871176

  



In order for our recruitment process to take place in a structured and qualitative manner, we only accept applications through our recruitment tool Careers.  

In connection with our recruitment process at GKN, we have taken part in recruiting and marketing channels. We therefore reject all contact from recruitment sites, media sales or similar companies

  


*The position requires that you undergo and be approved according to the current regulations for security protection. For positions where GKN's customer has requirements for security classification, this may, in some cases, involve specific citizenship requirements.*

  

We’ll offer you fantastic challenges and amazing opportunities. This is your chance to be part of an organisation that has proven itself to be at the cutting edge of our industry; and is committed to pushing the boundaries even further. And with some of the best training on offer in the industry, who knows how far you can go?

  


**A Great Place to work needs a Great Way of Working**

  


Everyone is welcome to apply to GKN. We believe that we can only achieve our ambitions through a coming together of diverse minds who enjoy collaborating in an inspirational environment. Through our commitment to diversity, inclusion and belonging and by living our five powerful principles we’ve created a culture where everyone feels welcome to contribute. It’s a culture that won us ‘The Best Workplace Culture Award’. By embracing and celebrating what makes us unique we encourage everyone to bring their full self to work.


We’re also committed to providing an accessible recruitment process, so if you require reasonable adjustments at any stage during our recruitment process please get in touch and let us know.


We are the place where human dreams, plus human endeavour, shape the future of aerospace innovation and technology.

title: Dig marketing Specialist - E-mail & Social Media
description:
* Are you passionate about creating engaging content, building brand presence and driving results through email and social media? Join our growing digital team as a Digital Marketing Specialist – Email & Social!

**The role**
------------

As our Digital Marketing Specialist – Email & Social, you’ll be the go-to person for all things related to our social media presence and email marketing efforts within our Business Area Food Packaging Solutions. In this role, you will work closely with the rest of the digital marketing team – including specialists in paid media, web/SEO– to ensure we deliver integrated and effective digital campaigns.



You will be responsible for planning, creating and optimizing content across our social channels and email marketing platforms.



You’ll be part of our Marketing Team and report directly to our Digital Marketing


**Your responsibilities include, but are not limited to:**


* Own and manage our social media channels – plan, create and publish content aligned with campaigns and brand tone
* Lead the creation and coordination of email marketing campaigns for all markets
* Build and optimize automated email workflows for nurturing and lead conversion

  


* Optimize content and messaging based on engagement insights and best practices
* Coordinate with paid media and web specialists to ensure consistent messaging across channels
* Stay up to date on social media trends and email marketing innovations.


**Who are you?**



You’re a digital marketer with a strong understanding of content-driven marketing, audience engagement, and channel-specific best practices. You enjoy combining creativity with data to drive measurable results and are confident in managing multiple tasks and timelines.



To thrive in this role we believe you have a degree in marketing, communications or a related field. You have experience in managing social media and email marketing in a professional setting and a solid understanding of email marketing platforms in an international, multi-language matrix. You are comfortable working with analytics tools and using insights to drive improvements



As a person you are a structured and collaborative team player who thrives in a fast-paced, cross-functional environment. You take initiative, are solution-oriented, and have a genuine interest in both branding and performance. You’ll enjoy working hands-on while contributing to strategic development of our digital .



You have previous experience working with email marketing platforms as well as Linkedin, Meta and Youtube accounts. Prior experience with SAP Marketing Cloud is considered a plus.


**Why Duni Group?**
-------------------



We offer you the opportunity to work in an international company where sustainability is high on the agenda. You get to work together with passionate colleagues and through our commitment, we help each other reach our goals. We believe in your infinite potential and ability to develop. Through your curiosity and courage you will get the opportunity to make a difference.


**Further information and application**
---------------------------------------



We would love to know more about you and your motivation for this job!



To apply, use the application form below. We do not accept applications through email due to GDPR. Please send us your application, CV and cover letter, in English, no later than August 8, 2025.



If you have any questions regarding the position, please contact hiring manager Louise Persson, louise.persson@duni.com. Please note that due to the vacation period, it may take longer than usual for us to get back to you. We appreciate your patience and understanding.



Start: As soon as possible, with regards of the notice period.


**About Duni Group**
--------------------



Duni Group is a market leader in sustainable dining and food packaging solutions for the restaurant market. The Group markets and sells its products under primarily the brands Duni, BioPak and Paper+Design, which are represented in more than 40 markets. Duni Group has around 2,700 employees in 26 countries, its headquarters in Malmö and production units in Sweden, Germany, Poland, Slovenia, United Kingdom and Thailand. Duni Group is listed on NASDAQ Stockholm under the ticker “Duni".



If you have not already gotten a good feeling for who we are, go to our website www.dunigroup.com. Here you can read more about who we are and what we are passionate about. Hopefully you want to be part of our team!

title: Research Engineer - Generative AI
description:
**About Neo4j:**

Neo4j is the leader in Graph Database & Analytics, helping organizations uncover hidden patterns and relationships across billions of data connections deeply, easily, and quickly. Customers use Neo4j to gain a deeper understanding of their business and reveal new ways of solving their most pressing problems. Over 84% of Fortune 100 companies use Neo4j, along with a vibrant community of 250,000+ developers, data scientists, and architects across the globe.



At Neo4j, we’re proud to build the technology that powers breakthrough solutions for our customers. These solutions have helped NASA get to Mars two years earlier, broke the Panama Papers for the ICIJ, and are helping Transport for London to cut congestion by 10% and save $750M a year. Some of our other notable customers include Intuit, Lockheed Martin, Novartis, UBS, and Walmart.



Neo4j experienced rapid growth this year as organizations looking to deploy generative AI (GenAI) recognized graph databases as essential for improving it’s accuracy, transparency, and explainability. Growth was further fueled by enterprise demand for Neo4j’s cloud offering and partnerships with leading cloud hyperscalers and ecosystem leaders. Learn more at neo4j.com and follow us on LinkedIn.

  


**Our Vision:**

At Neo4j, we have always strived to help the world make sense of data.



As business, society and knowledge become increasingly connected, our technology promotes innovation by helping organizations to find and understand data relationships. We created, drive and lead the graph database category, and we’re disrupting how organizations leverage their data to innovate and stay competitive.


**About the Role**
------------------



Join Neo4j's Generative AI (GenAI) team, where we are building advanced AI and machine learning solutions. As an AI Research Scientist, you will be instrumental in designing and developing the next generation systems for language understanding, entity extraction, and entity resolution. Your work will blend research with practical application to create graph-powered solutions for our GenAI product suite.


**Key Responsibilities**
------------------------


* Design and develop AI systems for natural language processing, entity extraction, and entity resolution, focusing on scalability and performance.
* Conduct research to improve algorithms and models for NLP and entity-centric systems.
* Build and deploy AI solutions, integrating them with Neo4j’s graph database technologies.
* Work with engineering and product teams to incorporate research findings into customer-facing products.
* Share expertise with colleagues to support team projects and goals.

**Minimum Qualifications**
--------------------------


* PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, or a related field.
* 3+ years of experience (including PhD work) in NLP, entity extraction, or entity resolution, with a focus on applying research to practical systems.
* Proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, or Hugging Face Transformers.
* Experience with software development practices, including version control and model deployment.
* Familiarity with graph databases or knowledge graphs is a plus.


#LI-hybrid

**Why Join Neo4j?**

Neo4j is, without question, the most popular graph database in the world. We have customers in every industry globally, and our products are a proven product/market fit. Joining our team is an opportunity to shape the future of data and analytics. Below are just a few exciting facts about Neo4j.


* Neo4j is one of the fastest-scaling technology companies in this industry. It recently surpassed $200M in annual recurring revenue (ARR), doubling its ARR over the past three years.
* Raised the biggest funding round in database history ($325M Series F). Backed by world-class investors like Eurazeo, GV (formerly Google Ventures), and Inovia Capital, Neo4j has raised over $600M in funding and is currently valued at over $2Bn. This puts Neo4j among the most well-funded database companies in history.
* 84% of the Fortune 100 and 58% of the Fortune 500 use Neo4j. Examples include Boston Scientific, BT Group, Caterpillar, Cisco, Comcast, Department for Education UK, eBay, NBC News, Novo Nordisk, Worldline, and others.
* Co-founder and CEO Emil Eifrem has built an amazing culture that prides itself on relationships, inclusiveness, innovation, and customer success.
* Countless industry awards. Massive enterprises and individual developers/data scientists love Neo4j. A strong sense of community and ecosystem is built around the platform.
* A recent Forrester Total Economic Impact™ Study cited Neo4j as delivering 417% ROI to customers.
* Neo4j was named as a Visionary in the 2023 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Cloud Database Management Systems among 19 other recognized global DBMS vendors. Neo4j was also ranked as a Strong Performer among 14 top vendors in The Forrester Wave™: Vector Databases, Q3 2024.


Research shows that members of underrepresented communities are less likely to apply for jobs when they don’t meet all the qualifications. **If this is part of the reason you hesitate to apply, we’d encourage you to reconsider and give us the opportunity to review your application.** At Neo4j, we are committed to building awareness and helping to improve these issues.



One of our central objectives is to provide an inclusive, diverse, and equitable workplace for everyone to develop their potential and have a positive, career-defining experience. We look forward to receiving your application.



**Neo4j Values:**

Neo4j is a Silicon Valley company with a Swedish soul. We foster collaboration and each of us is empowered to contribute and put our innovative stamp on projects. We hire candidates who reflect the following Neo4j core values:



(we)-[:VALUE]->(relationships)  

(we)-[:FOCUS\_ON]->(userSuccess)

title: Application Security Specialist - 100% Remote (Distans)
Cloud Security Engineer Google Cloud Platform
description:
**Role:** Cloud Security Engineer – Google Cloud Platform
  
**Seniority Level:** Senior
  
**Location:** Stockholm, Sweden (Hybrid – 50% remote)
  
**Assignment Period:** 1 September 2025 – 31 December 2026
  
  

Assignment Description
  
A senior Cloud Security Engineer is sought to strengthen cloud infrastructure security and provide a safe, scalable environment for application teams. This role is part of an engineering team focused on building secure platforms, enabling hundreds of teams to deliver innovative and secure digital services.
  
The position involves designing, developing, and implementing security guardrails and automation that protect infrastructure and applications from evolving threats. The role also provides technical leadership and support to other teams across areas such as cloud security, data protection, encryption, and secure development practices.
  
Key Responsibilities
  
Define and implement security guardrails for Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using defined security controls
  
  

Utilize tools like Google Cloud Security Command Center (SCC) to detect security gaps and apply remediation through code or policy changes
  
  

Collaborate with incident response and security operations teams to prevent and respond to threats
  
  

Participate in proof-of-concept testing and early adoption of new cloud security features
  
  

Build and maintain automation tools to continuously improve platform security
  
  

Support product and service teams on security best practices in areas such as network security, data encryption, secure coding, and business continuity
  
  

Qualifications
  
Minimum 2 years of experience with GCP, Azure, or AWS
  
  

Hands-on experience configuring platform capabilities such as IAM policies, security configurations, etc.
  
  

Proficient in scripting and understanding basic code
  
  

Experience working with infrastructure as code, especially Terraform
  
  

Demonstrates a passion for security and a deep curiosity for how systems work
  
  

Self-driven, proactive problem-solver with a commitment to ongoing learning and collaboration
  
  

Strong communication and teamwork skills, capable of explaining technical concepts to various audiences
  
  

Comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment and adapting to change
  
  

Required Skills
  
Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Azure, or AWS
  
  

Terraform
  
  

Security scripting/automation
  
  

English (Fluent)

title: Cloud Security Engineer – Stockholm
description:
Vill du vara med och bygga säkra molnplattformar i en komplex och storskalig miljö? Vi söker en erfaren Cloud Security Engineer med fokus på Google Cloud Platform till ett uppdrag där säkerhet, automatisering och innovation står i centrum.
  
  

Om rollenDu blir en del av ett molnteam som ansvarar för att bygga en säker och kraftfull plattform som används av hundratals utvecklingsteam. Uppdraget handlar om att ta fram och implementera tekniska säkerhetslösningar i GCP-miljöer, med målet att skydda applikationer, data och infrastruktur från hot.
  
Arbetet innebär att automatisera säkerhetsåtgärder, stödja andra team med säkerhetskompetens och samarbeta med incidenthantering och Security Operations Center. Du kommer också att delta i utvärderingar av nya funktioner och tjänster från molnleverantörer.
  
  

**I rollen kommer du bland annat att:** Definiera och implementera säkerhetspolicys och skyddsmekanismer i molnmiljö
  
Använda verktyg som Google Security Command Center (SCC) för att identifiera risker och föreslå åtgärder
  
Skriva script, tjänster och policies för att förbättra säkerhetsnivån
  
Arbeta med infrastruktur som kod (Terraform)
  
Delta i tekniska dialoger med andra team och fungera som säkerhetsexpert inom områden som dataskydd, kryptering, nätverkssäkerhet, och återställningsplaner
  
  

**Vi söker dig som har:** Minst 2 års erfarenhet av molnplattformar som GCP, Azure eller AWS
  
Erfarenhet av att konfigurera säkerhetsfunktioner och policies i molnmiljö
  
Grundläggande kod- och scriptkunskaper
  
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med infrastruktur som kod, t.ex. Terraform
  
Intresse för säkerhet och ett analytiskt sätt att angripa problem
  
Förmåga att prioritera, kommunicera tydligt och arbeta både självständigt och i team
  
  

**Meriterande erfarenheter:** Tidigare arbete med incidenthantering eller SOC
  
Deltagande i testning av nya säkerhetsfunktioner eller proof of concept-fas
  
Erfarenhet från större organisationer med höga säkerhetskrav
  
  

**Övrig information:** Placeringsort: Stockholm (50% distans)

title: Applied AI Engineer till Knowit Connectivity
description:
Vi på Knowit Connectivity söker nu nyfikna och drivna Applied AI Engineers som vill vara med och bygga vidare på vår satsning inom AI – och vara en nyckelspelare i att forma framtidens lösningar tillsammans med våra kunder och team. Tjänsten är öppen i hela Sverige – du kan vara baserad vid något av våra kontor, t.ex. Göteborg, Stockholm, Malmö eller Linköping, Örebro, Östersund, Umeå eller Jönköping.
  
Vad kommer du att göra?Som Applied AI Engineer kommer du att arbeta nära både kund och interna utvecklingsteam med att designa och implementera AI-komponenter i konkreta projekt – från koncept till produktionssättning. Du blir en central teknisk kraft i leveranser som rör allt från försvar, automotive och telecom till offentlig sektor.
  
  

**Det innebär bland annat att:**  

Bygga tekniska lösningar med hjälp av stora språkmodeller (LLM)
  
Utvärdera och jämföra olika LLM-arkitekturer beroende på användningsfall
  
Implementera RAG-lösningar och optimera deras prestanda
  
Arbeta med vektordatabaser och informationssökning
  
**Integrera AI-lösningar med backend och API:** er
  
Utveckla agentbaserade AI-lösningar
  
Säkerställa datasäkerhet, integritet och hantering av PII i AI-system
  
Bidra till intern kompetensutveckling inom AI
  
  

Du kommer att samarbeta med team där vi redan idag har pågående uppdrag inom exempelvis Domstolsverket, kommunal sektor och produktbolag med stor variation i tekniska miljöer och utmaningar.
  
**Vi tror att du har:** Ca 5 års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling, varav 1–3 år inom AI
  
Arbetat med eller implementerat lösningar baserade på LLM (t.ex. OpenAI, Anthropic, Cohere, etc.)
  
Praktisk erfarenhet av RAG och vektordatabaser (t.ex. Pinecone, Weaviate, FAISS)
  
Goda kunskaper inom backend/API-utveckling – gärna med Python, Node.js eller liknande
  
Van att tänka “Security First”, med förståelse för hantering av persondata i AI-lösningar
  
Erfarenhet av branscher som telecom, embedded eller automotive
  
  

**Meriterande:**  

Kunskap om standarder som ISO 26262 eller ISO/SAE 21434
  
Intresse av att utvecklas mot roller som t.ex. projektledare, scrummaster eller tech lead
  
Vem är du?
  
Du är en lösningsorienterad och nyfiken person med starkt teknikintresse. Du gillar att experimentera med AI och brinner för att förstå hur tekniken kan användas för att lösa riktiga problem – inte bara imponera tekniskt.
  
Som konsult hos Knowit är du vårt ansikte utåt och vi värdesätter egenskaper som:
  
Kommunikation – du trivs i dialog med kund
  
Driv – du tar initiativ och vill bidra till teamets framgång
  
Öppenhet – du delar gärna kunskap och bygger kultur tillsammans med kollegor
  
  

Vi söker inte bara kompetens – vi letar efter personer som vill växa tillsammans med oss.
  
Om ossKnowit Connectivity är en del av Knowit-koncernen och är specialiserade på embedded-, cloud- och applikationsutveckling. Vi jobbar med tekniken i framkant inom områden som t.ex. försvarssystem, självkörande fordon, infotainment och 5G.
  
Vi erbjuder dig en miljö där du får utvecklas, påverka och utmanas – med utrymme för både teknik och gemenskap. Hos oss har du stor möjlighet att forma vår AI-satsning framåt och vara en del i att bygga något nytt.
  
AnsökanVi arbetar med löpande urval, så vänta inte – skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
  
**Frågor? Kontakta:** David Blaag Nilsson david.blaag-nilsson@knowit.se

title: IFS Business Consultant – Service & Asset
company: Tech Talents Consulting i Sverige AB
description:
Vill du utvecklas i en affärsdriven och mjuk kultur där teamwork, enkelhet och passion är i fokus? Vill du arbeta med lösningar som faktiskt gör skillnad för kunderna och bidra till att skapa effektiva och hållbara processer i deras verksamheter? Då kan det här vara din nästa utmaning!
  
  

**Plats:** Göteborg eller Jönköping
  
  

IFS Business Consultant – Service & Asset
  
Som IFS Business Consultant inom Service & Asset arbetar du med att förbättra och effektivisera kundernas service- och underhållsprocesser med stöd av IFS Applications och/eller IFS Cloud. Du blir en viktig del av Addovations framgångsrika team där du arbetar i varierande projekt – från implementering och uppgraderingar till utrullning i nya länder och förbättringsprojekt.
  
  

Du skapar förståelse för kundens verksamhet och behov, och med din kunskap och erfarenhet inom det affärskritiska området är du en rådgivande partner som utmanar och presenterar lösningar som gör verklig skillnad. Tillsammans översätter ni behov och önskemål till effektiva affärssystemslösningar som förbättrar kundens vardag.
  
  

Vem är du?
  
Vi tror att du har några års erfarenhet från en roll där du jobbat nära system och verksamhet inom service och underhåll, och du kan ha följande bakgrund:
  
  

* Du kan ha arbetat som IFS-konsult inom Service & Asset, eller med liknande lösningar såsom Maximo, SAP, MS Dynamics 365, Pyramid eller M3.
* Du kan ha varit super user, processägare eller systemägare på kundsidan inom IFS service- och underhållslösning.
* Du kan ha arbetat som servicekoordinator, underhållsplanerare, service-/underhållstekniker eller fälttekniker med intresse för systemstöd.


För att trivas hos oss behöver du vara en lösningsorienterad person som ser möjligheter där andra ser problem, är nyfiken på teknik och systemstöd samt tycker att arbete ska vara både utvecklande och roligt. Du tror liksom vi på kraften i att arbeta tillsammans, tänka nytt och hålla det enkelt.
  
  

Varför Addovation?
  
* Möjlighet att påverka och växa i en värderingsstyrd organisation där trivsel, utveckling och samarbete står i centrum.
* En roll där du skapar värde för kunder samtidigt som du själv utvecklas i takt med projekten.
* Flexibilitet och möjlighet till hybridarbete för balans mellan arbete och fritid.
* Attraktiva förmåner och en arbetsplats där du trivs.


Addovation är ett nordiskt IT-bolag med 200 rådgivare, experter och utvecklare som arbetar tillsammans för att skapa enkla och innovativa lösningar. Med stark lokal närvaro i Sverige, Norge, Finland och Sri Lanka hjälper vi över 250 kunder världen över att effektivisera sina processer genom kraftfulla systemplattformar som IFS, Oracle NetSuite och Microsoft 365.
  
  

Ansökan
  
Känner du att det här är nästa steg för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag – vi arbetar med löpande urval!
  
  

**För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta:**  

Caroline Gärde, caroline.garde@techtalents.se (för placering i Göteborg, Jönköping)
  
  

Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: AD DS Migreringsspecialist / Senior AD-tekniker
description:
Du kommer ansvara för det tekniska genomförandet av en domänmigrering från befintlig Active Directory-miljö till en ny domänstruktur. Målet är att byta primärt DNS-namn och etablera en ny AD-forest utan driftavbrott, i en miljö med integrerade tjänster med bl.a Google Cloud Platform.
  
Rollen innefattar hands-on arbete med migrering av användare, datorer och tjänstekonton samt tekniska anpassningar av DNS, GPO, identitetstjänster och integrationer. Specialisten ansvarar även för tester, verktygsanvändning, felsökning och dokumentation av förändringen.
  
  

**Ansvar & arbetsuppgifter:**  

Utföra konfiguration, test och migrering av objekt från källdomän till måldomän med verktyg som ADMT, PowerShell och eventuellt ForensiT för profilmigrering.
  
Etablera och verifiera domäntrusts, SIDHistory och DNS-forwarders
  
Implementera GPO-överföring och anpassning från gammal till ny domänstruktur
  
Förbereda och utföra batchmigrering av användare och datorer i olika regioner
  
Samarbeta med arkitekt kring miljödesign, riskreducering och återställningsplaner
  
Identifiera och hantera domänberoenden i applikationer och tjänster
  
Arbeta enligt runbook och checklistor för säker migrering utan påverkan på produktion
  
Dokumentera tekniska åtgärder, konfigurationsändringar och migreringsutfall
  
Delta i dagliga tekniska avstämningar och bidra med status och incidentrapportering
  
  

**Erfarenhet & kompetens:**  

Minst 5 års erfarenhet av arbete med Active Directory-miljöer (AD DS, DNS, FSMO, GPO)
  
Erfarenhet av domänmigreringar, helst inter-forest (inklusive SIDHistory)
  
Färdighet i PowerShell för automatisering och felsökning
  
Praktisk erfarenhet av ADMT eller motsvarande verktyg
  
Förståelse för infrastrukturkomponenter såsom DHCP, DNS, DFS, certifikat (PKI)
  
God förståelse av certifikat- och autentiseringsmodeller (Kerberos, NTLM, ADFS)
  
Praktisk erfarenhet av att läsa loggar och analysera problem i loggböcker, Event Viewer och AD Replication
  
**Svenska:** flytande
  
  

**Meriterande:**  

Erfarenhet av LAPS eller Hybrid-AD-integrationer
  
Kännedom om Google Cloud IAM
  
Erfarenhet från globala organisationer med flera AD Sites och GPO-hantering i stor skala
  
  

**Personliga egenskaper:**  

Noggrann, strukturerad och van att arbeta enligt mallar och process
  
God kommunikationsförmåga, särskilt i teknisk samverkan med arkitekter och andra specialister
  
Ansvarstagande - levererar enligt plan och hanterar avvikelser proaktivt
  
Bekväm med att dokumentera sitt arbete och kommunicera teknisk status
  
  

**Projektstruktur:**  

Arbetet leds av en senior IT-arkitekt med övergripande ansvar för design, planering, beroendehantering och kommunikation
  
Specialisten arbetar självständigt inom givna ramar och ansvarar för teknik, verktyg och migreringsutförande enligt plan
  
  

**Uppdragstid:**  

Projektanställning eller konsultuppdrag i ca 6 månader
  
**Start:** Snarast möjlig
  
**Omfattning:** Heltid
  
  

Humanit
  
Humanit handlar om att göra saker lite annorlunda, att på riktigt sätta våra anställda i fokus. Vi växer tillsammans och värdesätter engagemang och ambition. För oss är det viktigt att du får chansen att vara med och påverka vägen framåt.
  
I utbyte erbjuder vi kompetens- och karriärutveckling genom varierande och utmanande uppdrag. Vi är inte branschinriktade och kan därför erbjuda en fantastisk variation bland uppdragen för dig som konsult. Självklart ser vi till att du får rätt utbildning och vi är väl medvetna om att det är det livslånga lärandet som bygger vår framgång.
  
Tillsammans skapar vi framtiden
  
Tillsvidareanställning med fast månadslön
  
Kollektivavtal
  
Vi tillämpar sex månaders provanställning, inklusive maxat friskvårdsbidrag
  
Utvecklingsplan
  
Hälsoförsäkring + pension
  
Förskottssemester
  
  

**Start:** Omgående med hänsyn till uppsägningstid och när säkerhetskontroll är genomförd. Uppdraget är på heltid och är tillsvidare.
  
**Plats:** Stockholm
  
**Ansökan:** Vi rekryterar löpande. Så skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
  
Humanit arbetar tillsammans med Great Place To Work för att vi skall bli Sveriges bästa arbetsplats.
  
  

**Och förresten:**  

Som en aktiv del i ett samhälle med kulturell och social mångfald är Humanit’s ambition att präglas av inkludering och bred representation, samt vara en arbetsplats med lika möjligheter för alla. Humanit anställer, bibehåller, befordrar och i övrigt behandlar alla medarbetare och kandidater efter erfarenhet, kvalifikationer och kompetens, oavsett kön, religion, ursprung, ålder, sexuell läggning, könsidentitet eller funktionsvariationer.

title: Analytics Engineer
description:
Nordnet is a leading pan-Nordic digital platform, bringing the joy of savings and investments to our customers. Our ambition is to inspire, encourage and enable everyone to take their savings to the next level, no matter who they are.


We believe that data is a cornerstone for our future success, and we're building the next generation of banking on Google Cloud Platform (GCP), with our analytics platform having moved to GCP in 2020.


Now we're looking for a passionate Analytics Engineer to be the bridge between business and data technology. At Nordnet, we strive to be data pioneers, devoted to harnessing the potential of data and AI. If you want to transform raw information into clear, meaningful data products that impact how we grow, innovate, and enhance our services, this could be your perfect fit.


**We would love it if you feel excited about at least some of these statements:**

* Designing and building elegant data structures in BigQuery.
* Ensuring data is accurate and reliable.
* Empowering others by making data models and dashboards accessible and understandable for everyone.
* Collaborating with diverse teams, bringing their data needs to life through your expertise.

  

**This is you**

You're passionate about data and learning new things, and you are a problem solver who wants to contribute with your experience and ideas. In your work, you are organised, methodical and agile in a way that benefits the team environment and ability to deliver solutions.


**To thrive in this role, we believe that most of these criteria describe you:**

* Have several years of experience as an Analytics Engineer/Business Intelligence Developer/Data Engineer.
* Skilled in designing and building data warehouses and analytics platforms
* Apply software engineering best practices like code reviews to ensure our work is of high quality.
* A clear communicator who can simplify complex concepts with ease.
* Exhibit deep SQL knowledge and experience with dbt.
* Looker (or similar) knowledge for creating inspiring dashboards.

  

**What we offer**


You would be a part of the Data & Insights department, consisting of smart and skilled Analytics Engineers, Data Engineers, Data Scientists and Data Analysts. Here, you'll not only learn and grow but also contribute with your unique perspective to our success.


We provide our team with a modern tech stack and actively explore the future of data, experimenting with AI to improve how we consume and create data products. You will enjoy the flexibility of hybrid working and a competitive salary and compensation package.


At Nordnet, data is a fundamental part of how we make decisions and innovate. If you're eager to make a difference and work with exciting technology in a supportive and empowering environment, we warmly encourage you to apply!


You are welcome to apply today, but the interviews will start in August.

 **Application**


If you have questions, please contact Alva Hellberg, Talent Acquisition Partner, at **alva.hellberg@nordnet.se**.


Apply today– we will start interviewing in late August after summer vacations. Please note that we do only accept applications through our recruitment system, hence no email applications will be considered.


We want to inform you that Nordnet conducts mandatory credit and background checks, as well as drug testing as a part of our recruitment process.


We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Receptionist Blå Huset
description:
Som en del av receptionsteamet för Stora Hotellet och U&Me har du en social och utåtriktad roll som i det dagliga arbetet alltid fokuserar på att leverera service på förstklassig nivå. Du jobbar i huvudsak med drift av receptionen där du hanterar in- och utcheckning, välkomnar gäster, löser deras önskemål och problem samt betar av administrativa uppgifter som bokningar och fakturahantering.


Vårt prioriterade fokus är alltid gästen framför oss.


Du kommer att vara en del av ett mindre, väl sammansvetsat team där varje medarbetare är en nyckelperson.

**Arbetsuppgifter**

* Gästbemötande i världsklass, premiumservice och hög tillgänglighet för gästen.
* Att i det dagliga arbetet sträva efter att leverera ett värdskap utöver det vanliga.
* Daglig drift av receptionen, t.ex in- och utcheckningar, bokningar och fakturahantering.
* Aktivt värva medlemmar till Best Western Rewards
* Driva merförsäljning så som uppgradering av rum och tillval.

**Kvalifikationer**  

Vi söker dig som har ett stort leende, en positiv inställning och ett genuint engagemang för magin som uppstår i det lyckade gästmötet. Du har en bred förståelse för hur ett varmt värdskap och ett personligt bemötande kan ta gästupplevelsen till en helt ny nivå. Vi söker en Receptionist som utmärker sig med sin goda service och tar varje tillfälle att förmedla det lilla extra till våra gäster. Du är också;

* Stresstålig, lösningsfokuserad och uppmärksam på gästens behov
* Ordningsam & noggrann
* Tycker om att jobba under varierat tempo
* Fungerar bra i team
* Har 1 år som hotellreceptionist eller liknande roll inom service på ditt CV
* Talar flytande svenska och har goda kunskaper inom engelska tal/skrift

**Meriterande**

Kännedom om bokningssystemen Opera Cloud


Eftergymnasial utbildning inom hotell/turism/restaurang/service management


Erfarenhet av att jobba med service och värdskap


Erfarenhet av att jobba inom ett Best Western hotell


Kännedom om Umeå som besöksstad


Språk


Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning, tjänstgöringsgrad och tillträde enligt överenskommelse. **Sista ansökningsdag är 21/7**, vi intervjuar löpande så tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum.

**Om Företaget:**


Blå huset är en familjeägd hotell-, restaurang- och konferenskoncern som i dag driver sju verksamheter i Umeå.


Vi erbjuder starka koncept och upplevelser med hög kvalitet och vi strävar efter att ge en personlig och minnesvärd upplevelse för alla som besöker oss, vår ambition är att konkurrera med de bästa i världen.


Hos oss kan du mötas, bo, äta, dricka och uppleva det bästa Umeå erbjuder under ett och samma tak, dygnet runt, året runt.


Blå Huset är: Stora Hotellet, Gotthards krog, U&Me Hotel, Kulturbageriet, Sävargården, Kajen och P5.

title: Applied AI Engineer till Knowit Connectivity
description:
Vi på Knowit Connectivity söker nu nyfikna och drivna Applied AI Engineers som vill vara med och bygga vidare på vår satsning inom AI – och vara en nyckelspelare i att forma framtidens lösningar tillsammans med våra kunder och team.  

  

Tjänsten är öppen i hela Sverige – du kan vara baserad vid något av våra kontor, t.ex. Göteborg, Stockholm, Malmö eller Linköping, Örebro, Östersund, Umeå eller Jönköping.

**Vad kommer du att göra?**
---------------------------


Som Applied AI Engineer kommer du att arbeta nära både kund och interna utvecklingsteam med att designa och implementera AI-komponenter i konkreta projekt – från koncept till produktionssättning. Du blir en central teknisk kraft i leveranser som rör allt från försvar, automotive och telecom till offentlig sektor.


Det innebär bland annat att:

* Bygga tekniska lösningar med hjälp av stora språkmodeller (LLM)
* Utvärdera och jämföra olika LLM-arkitekturer beroende på användningsfall
* Implementera RAG-lösningar och optimera deras prestanda
* Arbeta med vektordatabaser och informationssökning
* Integrera AI-lösningar med backend och API:er
* Utveckla agentbaserade AI-lösningar
* Säkerställa datasäkerhet, integritet och hantering av PII i AI-system
* Bidra till intern kompetensutveckling inom AI


Du kommer att samarbeta med team där vi redan idag har pågående uppdrag inom exempelvis Domstolsverket, kommunal sektor och produktbolag med stor variation i tekniska miljöer och utmaningar.

**Vi tror att du har:**
-----------------------

* Ca 5 års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling, varav 1–3 år inom AI
* Arbetat med eller implementerat lösningar baserade på LLM (t.ex. OpenAI, Anthropic, Cohere, etc.)
* Praktisk erfarenhet av RAG och vektordatabaser (t.ex. Pinecone, Weaviate, FAISS)
* Goda kunskaper inom backend/API-utveckling – gärna med Python, Node.js eller liknande
* Van att tänka “Security First”, med förståelse för hantering av persondata i AI-lösningar
* Erfarenhet av branscher som telecom, embedded eller automotive


Meriterande:

* Kunskap om standarder som ISO 26262 eller ISO/SAE 21434
* Intresse av att utvecklas mot roller som t.ex. projektledare, scrummaster eller tech lead

**Vem är du?**
--------------


Du är en lösningsorienterad och nyfiken person med starkt teknikintresse. Du gillar att experimentera med AI och brinner för att förstå hur tekniken kan användas för att lösa riktiga problem – inte bara imponera tekniskt.


Som konsult hos Knowit är du vårt ansikte utåt och vi värdesätter egenskaper som:

* Kommunikation – du trivs i dialog med kund
* Driv – du tar initiativ och vill bidra till teamets framgång
* Öppenhet – du delar gärna kunskap och bygger kultur tillsammans med kollegor


Vi söker inte bara kompetens – vi letar efter personer som vill växa tillsammans med oss.

**Om oss**
----------


Knowit Connectivity är en del av Knowit-koncernen och är specialiserade på embedded-, cloud- och applikationsutveckling. Vi jobbar med tekniken i framkant inom områden som t.ex. försvarssystem, självkörande fordon, infotainment och 5G.


Vi erbjuder dig en miljö där du får utvecklas, påverka och utmanas – med utrymme för både teknik och gemenskap. Hos oss har du stor möjlighet att forma vår AI-satsning framåt och vara en del i att bygga något nytt.

**Ansökan**
-----------


Vi arbetar med löpande urval, så vänta inte – skicka in din ansökan redan idag!

  

**Frågor?** Kontakta:  

**David Blaag Nilsson**  

david.blaag-nilsson@knowit.se

title: Grafisk marknadskommunikatör, Älvsjö
description:
**Brinner du för visuell kommunikation och vill sätta din prägel på ett starkt varumärke i tillväxt? Hos Hydroscand får du arbeta kreativt med kampanjer, koncept och grafisk form – tillsammans med engagerade kollegor i ett sammansvetsat team på huvudkontoret i Älvsjö. Nu söker vi dig som vill bli vår nya marknadskommunikatör med fokus på grafiskt material!**

**Om rollen**  

Hydroscand är marknadsledande i Skandinavien inom slang och ledningskomponenter och finns idag i 20 länder globalt. Som grafisk marknadskommunikatör ansvarar du för vår visuella kommunikation i Sverige och Danmark. Du säkerställer att allt grafiskt material är i linje med vår grafiska profil, varumärkesplattform och värderingar.


Du kommer att:

* Fungera som rådgivare i visuella kommunikationsfrågor
* Samordna produktion och uppföljning av kampanjer
* Stötta organisationen i arbetet med vår grafiska identitet


Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:

  

* **Grafisk produktion:** Skapa och samordna material för kampanjer, annonser, säljstöd, mässor och butikskommunikation – både för digitala och tryckta medier. Utveckla och underhåll mallar för intern och extern användning.
* **Visuell profilering:** Koordinera fasadskyltning, fordonsdekor och exteriör/interiör-profilering från idé till godkännande. Ansvara för beställning och uppdatering av profilprodukter som dekaler, flaggor och sortimentsmaterial.
* **Kampanjplanering:** Planera och genomföra visuella kampanjer enligt årsplan eller vid lanseringar. Producera och publicera annonser i print och digitala kanaler, samt ladda upp material i koncernens brandbook.
* **Förpackningsdesign:** Skapa koncept och visuella lösningar för förpackningar i linje med varumärket. Ta fram originalfiler för tryck enligt tekniska specifikationer och samarbeta med produktutveckling, marknad och tryckerier.
* **Foto och video:** Utföra eller koordinera fotografering samt enklare filmproduktion av produkter, personal och miljöer.


Du arbetar nära kollegor inom marknad, sälj, e-handel, försäljning, kundservice och våra filialer i Sverige. Tjänsten är placerad på vårt huvudkontor i Älvsjö och innebär arbete på plats.

**Din profil**  

Vi söker dig som har ett starkt öga för form, färg och kommunikation – och som trivs i ett varierat och kreativt arbete. Du är självgående, strukturerad och nyfiken på vår bransch.


För att lyckas i rollen bör du ha:

* 2–3 års erfarenhet från en liknande roll, gärna inom B2B eller närliggande bransch
* Vana av att samarbeta tvärfunktionellt med exempelvis försäljning, butiksdrift och IT
* Mycket goda kunskaper i Adobe Creative Cloud – framför allt Illustrator, Photoshop, After Effects och InDesign


För att trivas i rollen ser vi gärna att du är:

* En lagspelare med prestigelös inställning
* Van att arbeta strukturerat och prioritera i ett högt tempo
* Bekväm med att kommunicera via telefon och digitalt
* Initiativtagande, lösningsfokuserad och stolt över ditt hantverk


Hydroscand är ett familjeägt företag i stark tillväxt, med en kultur präglad av entreprenörskap, ansvarstagande och kundfokus. Vi arbetar aktivt för att främja mångfald i alla led och strävar efter en jämn könsfördelning. Vi tror på inkluderande arbetsplatser där olika perspektiv skapar bättre resultat – därför välkomnar vi sökande med olika bakgrunder

**Är du intresserad?**  

Sista ansökningsdag är den **21 juli 2025** men urval sker löpande, dröj därför inte med din ansökan. Ansökning sker via vår karriärsida (ansökning via e-post undanbedes).


För mer företagsinformation, vänligen besök hydroscand.se.

title: Kommunikatör med driv och bredd
description:
Vill du arbeta i en bred kommunikationsroll? Vi söker en kommunikatör som får arbeta både med hjärta och skärpa i vår externa och interna kommunikation. En roll för dig som kan hålla i hela processen – från idé till leverans.

**Ditt uppdrag**


Som kommunikatör hos oss får du ett övergripande ansvar för vår kommunikation – internt och externt. Du producerar innehåll på professionell nivå, håller ihop den röda tråden i både text och form, och säkerställer att allt vi kommunicerar ligger i linje med vårt varumärke och vår grafiska profil.


Utåt arbetar du varumärkesbyggande både B2B och mot potentiella medarbetare – du gör ProfilGruppen synligt och attraktivt i rätt sammanhang. Internt skapar du engagerande kommunikation som stärker vår företagskultur och våra medarbetares delaktighet.


Eftersom vi är ett börsnoterat bolag är även kommunikationen till aktiemarknaden en mycket viktig del. Den ska alltid vara korrekt, relevant och följa gällande regelverk.

**Dina arbetsuppgifter**

* Producera och publicera innehåll i olika kanaler – webb, intranät, sociala medier m.m.
* Vidareutveckla och uppdatera vår webbplats – både tekniskt och innehållsmässigt
* Säkerställa att allt material följer vår grafiska profil och håller hög kommunikativ kvalitet
* Arbeta aktivt med innehåll och utveckling av vårt intranät
* Ta fram presentationer, annonser, trycksaker och annat marknadsföringsmaterial – ofta från ax till limpa
* Projektleda exempelvis mässor och andra kommunikationsinsatser
* Ansvara för kontakt med externa samarbetspartners – t.ex. byråer, filmproducenter, tryckerier
* Vara ett internt stöd i frågor som rör mallar, dokument, presentationsmaterial m.m.

**Vi söker dig som…**


…är en trygg och erfaren kommunikatör som både kan tänka strategiskt och genomföra operativt. Du har mycket god skriftlig förmåga, ett öga för form och hanterar Adobe Creative Cloud med självklarhet. Du är van att arbeta med digitala plattformar, webbsidor (Wordpress) och intranät och har god teknisk förståelse.


Du är självgående, strukturerad och trivs med ansvar. Du kan hålla ihop många delar och driva kommunikation från planering till färdig leverans.


Har du erfarenhet av att arbeta i eller med börsnoterade bolag och har kunskap om finansiell kommunikation är det meriterande.  

  

**Brett samarbete**


Tjänsten rapporterar till vår HR- och kommunikationschef, men uppdragen och styrningen kommer delvis från andra håll då våra försäljningschefer är ansvariga för marknadskommunikationen och CFO för IR-kommunikationen. Din arbetsplats blir vårt huvudkontor i Åseda, med viss möjlighet att arbeta på distans ett par dagar i veckan. Samtidigt kräver rollen en närvaro på plats för att du ska kunna hålla dig uppdaterad om vad som händer i organisationen och vara nära verksamheten.

 **Låter det som din nästa utmaning?**  

Vi hoppas att tjänsten har väckt ditt intresse! Urval sker löpande och vi tillsätter så snart vi hittar rätt person – så vänta inte, skicka in din ansökan redan idag!

title: Data Sharing Leader in Analytic Management, Data & Technology IKEA Supply SCD
description:
* **Job ID:** R0012331-2
* **Date posted:** 04/07/2025
**Company description*** IKEA is on a constant journey to create a better everyday life for the many people by continuously reinvent ourselves as we continue to grow and develop to meet and exceed our customers’ needs. We will transform our digital capabilities, bringing core business processes, people, data & technology together - an enabler for IKEA to become an even better home furnishing company in the future. A journey that needs passionate people who embrace change, dare to question and want to make a difference. If that sounds like you, come and join us.
* Inter IKEA Group brings together: Retail Concept, Range and Supply. Together we work constantly to improve the IKEA home furnishing offer and make it more accessible for the many people. You will be part of IKEA Supply and the Supply Chain Development organisation. IKEA Supply is responsible for securing that the product offer is produced and delivered to our customers. We lead the supply agenda across many functions and work together with all business areas, different business units, but also retail markets to secure customer availability in all markets and sales channels at lowest total cost.
* To realize our ambitions in the IKEA Supply Strategy, IKEA has identified the need to enhance and modernize our way of working. We are establishing a digital foundation of information and accelerate data management and analytics capabilities for real time insights leading to even better and faster decisions. Within the area of Order and Financial Management we are setting a new foundational digital core in place, for total IKEA and for many years to come.
 **Job description*** Supply Analytics Management has the assignment to create value and enable business growth by bringing data from across IKEA together to gather actionable insights. We work closely with our business stakeholders and form product teams that deliver cutting edge; data driven solutions for our coworkers.
* We work in a modern cloud-based Azure environment, and you will be a part of the data sharing and front-end development team, securing our data products and analytical capabilities sharing. You will be regularly involved in workshops with coworkers to harness modern data infrastructure efficiently and provide long term solutions.
* You will:
* + Guide and facilitate data sharing within the wider IKEA organisation.
	+ Lead the development and roll-out of data sharing practices across a complex organisation with multiple legal entities and privacy concerns.
	+ Be a central point of contact and escalation within the IKEA data sharing community.
	+ Drive continuous improvement, collaboration and knowledge sharing of data sharing practices, tools and assets across IKEA.
	+ Help handling privacy and ethical concerns that may relate to the sharing or processing of data.
	+ Ensure consistency by supporting the use of relevant development techniques, digital frameworks, and best practices.
	+ Work closely with Supply Capability Areas to enable identified roles in creating self-service digital product.
	+ Securing architectural principles applied in data sharing.
	+ Promote the data sharing culture leading by example.
	+ Act as consultant in implementing and suggesting technical solutions to grant access to data and digital products, including the ability to identify scenarios who may require advanced security features.
	+ Verify the adherence of digital product to IKEA design framework SKAPA.
* In this role you will report to our Data & Analytics Manager in Data & Technology at IKEA Supply.
* **Is This Role for Me?**
* + Do you share IKEA’s values?
	+ Do you have at least 3 years' experience as an analytical developer?
	+ Do you have deep knowledge of Power BI, DAX and connected services?
	+ Are you familiar in maintaining and structuring security groups in ENTRA ID or alternative services, including the ability to invite externals?
* If your answer is yes to all the four statements above, then come and join us at IKEA!
 **Qualification*** As a Data Sharing Leader, you will support the organisation in leveraging information and data. This you will do in many ways; by supporting teams in removing barriers hindering data sharing, by supporting data publishers and users in adopting sharing standards and guardrails and by communicating and building understanding of the data landscape across IKEA. You will actively and proactively help product and project teams understand what data they need to fulfil their purpose and help them seamlessly access the right data assets. Making sure that the organisation can maximise the value of its data while adhering to the highest standards of ethics and privacy.
* We believe that our new colleague in Data Sharing should have at least 3 years' experience in building systems that collect, manage, and convert data into usable information, designing and implementing data and digital products to a high industry standard as well as good knowledge of SQL, Power BI, DAX and Entra ID.
* In addition, excellent working knowledge of Power BI, ideally with Associate Power BI or Fabric certification is beneficial. You will collaborate closely with the Supply Data and Technology team as well as with other practitioners across the larger IKEA organisation.
* The ideal applicant has good communication and collaboration skills and will be a team player who takes ownership, builds cross-functional relationships with coworkers, and loves sharing knowledge. You are a curious problem solver who wants to keep learning in a dynamic global environment. The role is office based so meeting face to face and working collaboratively to solve problems should be something you enjoy.
* You are a big fan of home furnishing and enjoy building a purposeful business by creating engaging and trustful relationships with colleagues, stakeholders and business partners. As a person you are appreciated for collaborative spirit and how you lead with strong focus on both technology and people. You create impact and inspiration regardless of function or formal reporting lines.
* The IKEA culture and values are crucial for our business and day to day work life. For you to thrive and grow with IKEA it’s important that you share our values! You can read more regarding our values and life at IKEA on our website www.ikea.com or just watch this video: https://bit.ly/ikea-what-if
* Together, we create a workplace where everyone feels free to be themselves – to experiment, try new ways, and dare to ask, “What if…?” We believe in everyday personal growth and offer the opportunity to develop your career globally. At IKEA we have a vibrant culture where ideas are heard, where there is opportunity to learn new skills and where the goal always is "to create a better everyday life for the many people". We give down-to-earth, straightforward people the possibility to grow, both as individuals and in their professional roles. We offer this position in a fast paced, truly global environment with an endless supply of challenges and development opportunities.
 **More Information*** If you have any questions about the role, please reach out to Corrado Mazzoni, Data Sharing Leader, corrado.mazzoni@inter.ikea.com, Robert Pernetun, IKEA Supply Data & Analytics Manager, robert.prenetun1@inter.ikea.com, or questions about the recruitment process feel free to connect with Dan Gustafsson, dan.gustafsson@inter.ikea.com, People & Culture Leader.
* This position is located in Älmhult or Malmö, Sweden, or alternatively in Warsaw, Poland.
* Please also note that we do only handle applications in English and no applications coming in by email. We look forward to receiving your application at the latest **8th of August 2025**. Due to vacation period pls be aware that response time might be a bit longer so have patience with us.
* At IKEA we believe that we’re better when we’re physically together for collaboration, dialogues and conversations. We believe in the power of human interactions; the informal chats, the energy, belonging and creativity generated by people being in the same place. Our approach is that we spend majority of our time in the IKEA workplace and with flexibility to work from home when relevant.
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Tech Lead (100% remote)
company_industry: Information Services and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**About Severalnines**
 Join the revolution as we help developers and enterprises build and migrate their databases to the cloud. According to IDC, the database market is projected to reach $119 billion by 2025, with the fastest-growing segment being Database-as-a-Service (DBaaS). Be part of this transformative shift - join Severalnines and make a real impact.
   

  

 A career at Severalnines means working alongside some of the smartest and most talented experts in the open-source database world. We’re headquartered in Kalmar, Sweden, and our entire team works remotely from their home offices.
   

  

**Job Purpose**
 We are seeking an experienced Tech Lead to lead, mentor, and develop a high-performing team of software engineers. You will oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of our product roadmap, ensuring projects are completed on time, within scope, and budget. In this role, you will provide technical guidance, uphold best practices in coding and security, and stay current with industry trends to drive innovation.
   

  

 You will collaborate closely with product management and stakeholders, facilitating clear communication and representing the engineering team in strategic decision-making. Additionally, you will be responsible for maintaining high standards of code quality, testing, and performance optimization.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Team Leadership and Development:
* Lead, mentor, and develop a high-performing team of software engineers
* Foster a collaborative and innovative work environment
* Conduct regular performance reviews and provide constructive feedback
* Clearly communicate roles, expectations, work direction to all team members on a regular basis
* Hold team members accountable to meet aligned and accepted objectives, features, and user stories for each sprint and program increment deliverables
* Ensuring the development process is compliant with industry standards (ISO 27001, SOC2)
* Project Management:
* Oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of the product roadmap
* Ensure projects are completed on time, within scope, and within budget
* Coordinate with stakeholders to gather requirements and prioritize tasks
* Technical Guidance:
* Provide technical direction, guidance and coaching for the engineering team
* Ensure best practices in coding, architecture, and security are upheld
* Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies to drive innovation
* Work in the codebase yourself when this doesn't affect your management responsibilities. Perform code reviews and mentor new hires. Implement new features and tests, and maintain them
* Collaboration and Communication:
* Work closely with product management & stockholders to define project requirements and deliverables
* Facilitate clear communication between engineering teams and other departments
* Represent the engineering team in strategic planning and decision-making processes
* Maintain a strong customer focus, ensuring that engineering solutions meet or exceed customer expectations and contribute to overall business objectives.
* Quality Assurance and Performance Optimization:
* Implement and maintain high standards for code quality, testing, and performance optimization
* Monitor and improve the reliability, performance, and scalability of our systems and applications
* Continuously assess and improve engineering processes and practices to enhance team efficiency, product quality, and innovation
* Establish and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for team productivity, code quality, and project delivery timelines.


**Required Skills/Abilities**
* 7+ years of experience in software engineering, with at least 2 years in a leadership or managerial role
* Advanced knowledge of Kubernetes and OpenStack is a must
* Strong proficiency in the Golang ecosystem (or similar) and associated frameworks is preferred
* Hands-on experience with cloud computing platforms
* Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills
* Ability to focus on adding value and make an impact to our customers
* Fluent English (C1+)


**What We Offer**
* B2B contract with full-time employee benefits
* Annual bonus based on company results
* 2000 USD budget to setup and maintain your virtual office (PC, Notebook, Headset, etc.)
* 4 weeks paid vacation annually
* Additional birthday day off
* Paid public holidays in your country
* Monthly budget for sports activities
* You can work from anywhere
* Flexible working arrangements
* Offsite team meetings at least once a year

 Proven experience as a Microsoft 365 Solution Architect in large-scale enterprise environments.

title: Group Head of Professional Services
description:
*Aceve is in business to back the builders of society.* 
**We are the SaaS powerhouse, built by engineers, developers, salespeople, administrators, marketeers, controllers, and much mor**
*. With over 500 employees, more than 950 million SEK in revenue and extensive experience in the field, we combine tradition and tech to provide a pioneering platform that helps our customers to achieve more.*
**What will you do?**




 We are looking for an experienced and hands-on Head of Professional Services to establish and lead this function at Group level. This role will define the strategic direction, operational standards, and performance model for professional services across all Aceve entities.
   

  

 The Professional Services organization encompasses:
   

 - Customer onboarding and implementation
   

 - Consulting and training services
   

 - Advisory on workflow optimization
   

 - Revenue realization through billable services
   

  

 You will own the frameworks, tooling, delivery methodology, KPIs, and financial model that ensures services are delivered efficiently, profitably, and with consistent quality across markets.
   





**Group-Level Strategy & Operating Model**
 -Build and implement the group-wide Professional Services operating model — including structure, processes, playbooks, pricing, and KPIs
   

 - Define the service tiers, commercial offerings, and delivery methodology (e.g., white-glove vs. self-serve)
   

 - Drive alignment across local teams to ensure consistency in delivery and customer experience
   





**Customer Onboarding & Time to Value**
 - Define and enforce onboarding standards to reduce implementation time, lower onboarding cost, and maximize onboarding revenue
   

 - Develop segmentation-specific onboarding paths (e.g., SMB, Mid-Market, Enterprise)
   

 - Establish and track KPIs like Time to Value (TTV), Implementation Margin, and Activation Rates
   





**Consulting & Value-Add Services**
 - Create packaged and custom consulting services (workflow audits, process reengineering, system integrations)
   

 - Drive cross-sell of services into existing customer base in partnership with Sales and Customer Success
   





**Commercial Model & P&L Accountability**
 - Define commercial structure (rate cards, margins, utilization targets) for all professional services
   

 - Support budgeting, forecasting, and performance tracking across countries
   

 - Partner with finance to improve gross margin from service delivery
   





**Performance Management & Enablement** 
  
   

 - Standardize delivery KPIs: billable utilization, CSAT/NPS, delivery velocity, attach rate
   

 - Implement tools and systems to support service delivery (e.g., PSA systems, playbooks, project trackers)
   

 - Recruit, train, and develop a high-performing professional services leadership layer across geographies
 



 - Identify best practices and roll-out on group level
   





**Cross-functional Alignment**
 - Collaborate closely with Sales, Customer Success, Product, and R&D to drive end-to-end customer success
   

 - Ensure readiness to support international expansion and product launches from a delivery standpoint
 



  

  





**Qualifications & Skills:**



* 8–12+ years in a Professional Services, Customer Success, or SaaS Delivery leadership role
* Proven track record building or scaling professional services in a B2B SaaS company
* Experience with both direct implementation and partner-led delivery models
* Strong grasp of delivery metrics: time to value, utilization, margin, attach rate, CSAT
* Experience working in or with private equity-owned businesses is a strong plus
* International exposure (especially across Nordic or European markets)
* Structured, analytical, and outcomes-driven; thrives in operational design and execution
* Commercially savvy; understands revenue and cost drivers in services P&L
* Strong cross-functional leadership, collaboration and stakeholder management
* Can operate in a high-growth, fast-paced, and often ambiguous environment
* Fluent in English; additional Nordic or Germanic languages are a plus







  





**Not ticking every box?** 
 No worries! We value potential and drive, so apply anyway or connect with us- you might be just what we're looking for in our growing organisation! Join Aceve and take your expertise to the next level, together we are redefining what’s possible in craft and construction solutions!
   

  





  





*Aceve is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Our selection process is conducted continuously and without discrimination, ensuring an equal opportunity for all candidates.*

title: Head of Solution Support
description:
*Do you want to shape a function that connects Sales and Delivery in our growing datacenter business?*
 We are now hiring a Head of Solution Support to take ownership of this key function. You will lead a small team, define roles and responsibilities, and serve as the link between Sales and Delivery. Your focus will be on early involvement, clear alignment, and solutions we can deliver. You’ll report to the Senior Director of Site Operations and be part of the leadership team.
   

  

 At GlobalConnect, Site Operations handles the daily operations and transformation of datacenter sites, co-location facilities and Points of Presence (PoPs) across the Nordics and northern Germany. Demand is growing, and we are expanding our infrastructure through both near-term solutions and major build-out projects.
   

  

**Strategic Leadership**
 You will build and formalize the Solution Support function within Site Operations. The role is key to align sales with delivery across our datacenter operations and ensuring consistency for both Carrier and B2B customers. It also plays an active role in the integration of Site Operations into a unified Plan-Build-Run model.
   

  

* Formalize the function’s scope within Site Operations
* Set up clear processes for early delivery involvement and solution signoff
* Align solution offerings with datacenter infrastructure including capacity and operational capabilities
* Standardize product descriptions and documentation across Nordic markets
* Drive the function’s role in the ongoing organizational transformation, including how we support internal tools like the customer portal


**Team Leadership**
 The team exists, but the function is not yet fully formed. Your role is to shape a group of individuals into a cohesive, structured team with a clear purpose.
   

  

* Lead a team of 4+ people working with sales support, product coordination and contract administration, and eventually expanding the team to provide pan Nordic support.
* Define how the team operates within Site Operations & connect the team’s work to business goals.
* Take an active role in customer cases and delivery projects when needed


**Vendor & Service Coordination**
 You will oversee vendors, services, and internal handovers to ensure smooth delivery of datacenter solutions.
   

  

* Leverage potential in Remote Hands and Cross Connect products to increase revenue
* Align vendor and supplier setup with Procurement and Contract Management and invoicing with Finance
* Manage onboarding of customer solutions and recurring services


**To Succeed In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Relevant Leadership experience in infrastructure or datacenter services in the IT & telecom sector
* Experience orchestrating solution design, presales involvement and delivery handover
* Proven experience leading teams or functions in a technical or operational setting
* Fluency in English. Nordic language skills are a plus


*You don’t need to send a personal letter unless there’s something in your background that isn’t already covered in your CV or LinkedIn profile.*
**About Us**
 GlobalConnect is one of the leading connectivity providers in Northern Europe. We’re 2000 passionate and talented individuals who want to make a difference, turning our customers’ visions into reality through connectivity. Our goal is to create the best possible conditions for engaged employees, a place where you can develop and grow, and create unforgettable memories and enjoyable experiences.
   

  

 We have helped develop and digitize societies across the Nordics for more than two decades. Our purpose is what drives us to continue - turning visions into reality by empowering society with connectivity.

title: Graduate Development Program
description:
This role has been designed as ‘Hybrid’ with an expectation that you will work on average 2 days per week from an HPE office.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge-to-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.

 College/University Graduate hires (within 12 months of graduation per the company's definition) undergoing a specific training and development path within the EMEA Graduate Program.

**Education And Experience Required**

 Accountability, Accountability, Action Planning, Active Learning (Inactive), Active Listening, Bias, Business, Calendar Management, Coaching, Computer Literacy, Creativity, Critical Thinking, Design Thinking, Empathy, Follow-Through, Group Problem Solving, Growth Mindset, Intellectual Curiosity (Inactive), Long Term Planning, Managing Ambiguity, Office Administration, Policy and procedures, Recordkeeping, Risk Assessment, Software Development {+ 5 more}
